GR14ruphbr_u:11: tasya hareḥ pada-kamalaṃ vande caitanya-devasya // RBhrs_1,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:17: sphuratu sanātana suciraṃ tava bhakti-rasāmṛtāmbhodhiḥ // RBhrs_1,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:19: ajñenāpi mayāsya kriyate suhṛdām pramodāya // RBhrs_1,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:21: catvārah khalu vakṣyante bhāgāḥ pūrvādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_1,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:25: bhāvāśritā tṛtīyā ca turyā prema-nirūpikā // RBhrs_1,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:26: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:27: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam // RBhrs_1,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:34: ahaituky avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣottame // RBhrs_1,1.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:36: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // RBhrs_1,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:37: sa eva bhakti-yogākhya ātyantika udāhṛtaḥ // RBhrs_1,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:43: kleśās tu pāpaṃ tad-bījam avidyā ceti te tridhā // RBhrs_1,1.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:45: aprārabdhaṃ bhavet pāpaṃ prārabdhaṃ ceti tad dvidhā // RBhrs_1,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:55: kutaḥ punas te bhagavan nu darśanāt // RBhrs_1,1.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:57: durjāty-ārambhakaṃ pāpaṃ yat syāt prārabdham eva tat // RBhrs_1,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:70: sroto-gaṇās tam araṇaṃ bhaja vāsudevam // RBhrs_1,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:73: avidyāṃ nirdahaty āśu dāva-jvāleva pannagīm // RBhrs_1,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:76: sadguṇāḥ sukham ity-ādīny ākhyātāni manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_1,1.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:79: yenārcito haris tena tarpitāni jaganty api /
GR14ruphbr_u:80: rajyanti jantavas tatra jangamāḥ sthāvarā api // RBhrs_1,1.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:88: sukhaṃ vaiṣayikaṃ brāhmam aiśvaraṃ ceti tat tridhā // RBhrs_1,1.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:90: siddhayaḥ paramāścaryā bhuktir muktiś ca śāśvatī /
GR14ruphbr_u:91: nityaṃ ca paramānando bhaved govinda-bhaktitaḥ // RBhrs_1,1.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:93: bhūyo 'pi yāce deveśa tvayi bhaktir dṛḍhāstu me /
GR14ruphbr_u:94: yā mokṣānta-caturvarga phaladā sukhadā latā // RBhrs_1,1.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:97: puruṣārthās tu catvārās tṛṇāyante samantataḥ // RBhrs_1,1.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:100: bhuktyaś cādbhutās tasyāś ceṭikāvad anuvratāḥ // RBhrs_1,1.34 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:103: hariṇā cāśvadeyeti dvidhā sā syāt sudurlabhā // RBhrs_1,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:108: rājan patir gurur alaṃ bhavatāṃ yadūnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:109: daivaṃ priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaro vaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:110: astv evam aṅga bhajatāṃ bhagavān mukundo
GR14ruphbr_u:111: muktiṃ dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam // RBhrs_1,1.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:117: sukhāni goṣpadāyante brāhmāṇy api jagad-guro // RBhrs_1,1.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:120: kurvanti kṛtinaḥ kecit catur-vargaṃ tṛṇopamam // RBhrs_1,1.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:125: na sādhyati mām yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava /
GR14ruphbr_u:126: na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā // RBhrs_1,1.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:133: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam // RBhrs_1,1.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:136: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā // RBhrs_1,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:146: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā // RBhrs_1,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:149: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā // RBhrs_1,2.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:150: sā bhaktiḥ saptama-skandhe bhaṅgyā devarṣiṇoditā // RBhrs_1,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:152: tasmāt kenāpy upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet // RBhrs_1,2.4 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:153: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā // RBhrs_1,2.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:156: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:158: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:159: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaś ca smartavyaś cecchatābhayam // RBhrs_1,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:161: smartavyaḥ satataṃ viṣṇur vismartavyo na jātucit /
GR14ruphbr_u:162: sarve vidhi-niṣedhāḥ syur etayor eva kiṅkarāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:163: ity asau syād vidhir nityaḥ sarva-varṇāśramādiṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:168: catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak // RBhrs_1,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:169: ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:170: na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:173: arcann ubhyataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām // RBhrs_1,2.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:175: surarṣe vihitā śāstre harim uddiśya yā kriyā /
GR14ruphbr_u:176: saiva bhaktir iti proktā tayā bhaktiḥ parā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:179: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau // RBhrs_1,2.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:182: na nirviṇṇo nātisakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhidaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:183: uttamo madhyamaś ca syāt kaniṣṭhaś ceti sa tridhā // RBhrs_1,2.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:185: śāstre yuktau ca nipuṇaḥ sarvathā dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:186: prauḍha-śraddho 'dhikārī yaḥ sa bhaktāv uttamo mataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:188: yaḥ śāstrādiṣv anipuṇaḥ śraddhāvān sa tu madhyamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:190: yo bhavet komala-śraddhaḥ sa kaniṣṭho nigadyate // RBhrs_1,2.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:192: madhye yasmin bhagavatah kṛpā syāt tat-priyasya vā // RBhrs_1,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:194: yathebhaḥ śaunakādiś ca dhruvaḥ sa ca catuḥsanaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:196: tāvad bhakti-sukhasyātra katham abhyudayo bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:197: tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa gatim aṇvīm anicchataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:198: bhaktir hṛta-manaḥ-prāṇān premṇā tān kurute janān // RBhrs_1,2.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:203: anicchato me gatim aṇvīṃ prayuṅkte // RBhrs_1,2.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:205: eṣāṃ mokṣāya bhaktānāṃ na kadācit spṛhā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:219: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:223: sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:224: kiṃ tv antakāsi-lulitāt patatāṃ vimānāt // RBhrs_1,2.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:226: na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin
GR14ruphbr_u:229: vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:245: ye tu necchanty api paraṃ te svārtha-kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:247: tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam ananta ādye
GR14ruphbr_u:248: kiṃ tair guṇa-vyatikarād iha ye sva-siddhāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:250: sāraṃ juṣāṃ caraṇayor upagāyatāṃ naḥ // RBhrs_1,2.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:252: pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgā
GR14ruphbr_u:254: kāla-grastaṃ kiyad idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatāṃ te
GR14ruphbr_u:255: muktis teṣāṃ na hi bahumatā nārasiṃhāparaiḥ kim // RBhrs_1,2.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:263: necchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kuto 'nyat kāla-viplutam // RBhrs_1,2.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:272: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
GR14ruphbr_u:275: na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama /
GR14ruphbr_u:276: vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam // RBhrs_1,2.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:283: naivecchaty āśiṣaḥ kvāpi brahmarṣir mokṣam apy uta /
GR14ruphbr_u:284: bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe 'vyaye // RBhrs_1,2.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:286: varaṃ deva mokṣaṃ na mokṣāvadhiṃ vā
GR14ruphbr_u:289: sadā me manasy avirāstāṃ kim anyaiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:293: na mokṣe graho me 'sti dāmodareha // RBhrs_1,2.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:295: na dharma kāmam arthaṃ vā mokṣaṃ vā varadeśvara /
GR14ruphbr_u:296: prārthaye tava pādābje dāsyam evābhikāmaye // RBhrs_1,2.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:298: punaḥ punar varān ditsur viṣṇur muktiṃ na yācitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:299: bhaktir eva vṛtā yena prahlādaṃ taṃ namāmy ahaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:300: yadṛcchayā labdham api viṣṇor dāśarathes tu yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:301: naicchan mokṣaṃ vinā dāsyaṃ tasmai hanumate namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:304: bhavān prabhur ahaṃ dāsa iti yatra vilupyate // RBhrs_1,2.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:309: icchāmi hi mahābhāga kāruṇyaṃ tava suvrata // RBhrs_1,2.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:312: sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahā-mune // RBhrs_1,2.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:315: bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṃ kathaṃ paśyema hi striyaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:317: ātmārāmāś ca munayo nirgranthā apy urukrame /
GR14ruphbr_u:318: kurvanty ahaitukīṃ bhaktim ittham-bhūta-guṇo hariḥ // RBhrs_1,2.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:320: sālokyādis tathāpy atra bhaktyā nātivirudhyate // RBhrs_1,2.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:322: sālokyādir dvidhā tatra nādyā sevā-juṣaṃ matā // RBhrs_1,2.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:324: naivāṅgīkurvate jātu muktiṃ pañca-vidhām api // RBhrs_1,2.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:326: yeṣāṃ śrīśa-prasādo 'pi mano hartuṃ na śaknuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:331: dṛṣtāntitā vaśiṣṭhena hari-bhaktir nṛpaṃ prati // RBhrs_1,2.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:333: sarve 'dhikāriṇo hy atra hari-bhaktau yathā nṛpa // RBhrs_1,2.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:336: samprāpya vaiṣṇavīṃ dīkṣāṃ dīkṣitā iva sambabhuḥ // RBhrs_1,2.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:339: na karmaṇām akaraṇād eṣa bhakty-adhikāriṇām // RBhrs_1,2.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:341: iti vaiṣṇava-śāstrāṇāṃ rahasyaṃ tad-vidāṃ matam // RBhrs_1,2.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:343: sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sā guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:344: viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:348: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:351: ājñāyaiva guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān /
GR14ruphbr_u:352: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:355: na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan /
GR14ruphbr_u:359: sarva-dharman parityājya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GR14ruphbr_u:360: ahaṃ tvāṃ sarva-pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā sucaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:363: tathā na spṛśato rāmopāsakaṃ vidhi-pūrvakam // RBhrs_1,2.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:370: kintu tāni prasiddhāni nirdiśyante yathāmati // RBhrs_1,2.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:373: ekaṃ karmātra vidvadbhir ekaṃ bhakty-aṅgam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:378: nivāso dvārakādau ca gaṅgāder api sannidhau // RBhrs_1,2.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:381: eṣām atra daśāṅgānāṃ bhavet prārambha-rupatā // RBhrs_1,2.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:393: nirmālyādeś ca tasyāgre tāṇḍavaṃ daṇḍavan-natiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:395: arcanaṃ paricaryā ca gītaṃ saṅkīrtanaṃ japaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:399: smṛtir dhyānaṃ tathā dāsyaṃ sakhyam ātma-nivedanam // RBhrs_1,2.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:401: sarvathā śaraṇāpattis tadīyānāṃ ca sevanam // RBhrs_1,2.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:405: śraddhā viśeṣataḥ prītiḥ śrī-mūrter aṅghri-sevane // RBhrs_1,2.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:407: sajātīyāśaye snigdhe sādhau saṅgaḥ svato vare // RBhrs_1,2.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:410: nikhila-śraiṣṭhya-bodhāya punar apy atra kīrtanam // RBhrs_1,2.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:416: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam /
GR14ruphbr_u:417: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam // RBhrs_1,2.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:421: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ // RBhrs_1,2.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:428: sa mṛgyaḥ śreyasāṃ hetuḥ panthāḥ santāpa-varjitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:429: anvāpta-śramaṃ pūrve yena santaḥ pratasthire // RBhrs_1,2.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:432: aikāntikī harer bhaktir utpātāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_1,2.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:434: vastutas tu tathā naiva yad aśāstrīyatekṣyate // RBhrs_1,2.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:437: acirād eva sarvārthaḥ sidhyaty eṣām abhīpsitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:441: harim uddiśya bhogāni kāle tyaktavatas tava /
GR14ruphbr_u:445: saṃvatsaraṃ vā ṣaṇmāsān māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:446: dvārakā-vāsinaḥ sarve narā nāryaś caturbhujāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:450: diviṣṭhā yatra paśyanti sarvān eva caturbhujān // RBhrs_1,2.106 //
GR14ruphbr_u:456: kas tāṃ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:459: yāvatā syāt sva-nirvāhaḥ svīkuryāt tāvad artha-vit /
GR14ruphbr_u:460: ādhikye nyūnatāyāṃ ca cyavate paramārthataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:468: pūjitāḥ praṇatāḥ dhyātāḥ kṣapayanti nṝṇām agham // RBhrs_1,2.110 //
GR14ruphbr_u:478: na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān naivābhyased bahūn /
GR14ruphbr_u:479: na vyākhyām upayuñjīta nārambhān ārabhet kvacit // RBhrs_1,2.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:483: aviklava-matir bhūtvā harim eva dhiyā smaret // RBhrs_1,2.114 //
GR14ruphbr_u:487: kathaṃ tatra mukundasya sphūrti-sambhāvanā bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.115 ///
GR14ruphbr_u:494: piteva putraṃ karuṇo nodvejayati yo janam /
GR14ruphbr_u:495: viśuddhasya hṛṣīkeśas tūrṇaṃ tasya prasīdati // RBhrs_1,2.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:499: vaiṣṇavena sadā te tu varjanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:502: harer apy aparādhān yaḥ kuryād dvipadapāṃśulaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:503: nāmāśrayaḥ kadācit syāt taraty eva sa nāmataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:504: nāmno hi sarva-suhṛdo hy aparādhāt pataty adhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.120 //
GR14ruphbr_u:507: nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śrṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:508: tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yāty adhaḥ sukṛtāc cyutaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:514: te vaiṣṇavā bhuvanam āśu pavitrayanti // RBhrs_1,2.122 //
GR14ruphbr_u:521: sa loka-pāvano bhutvā tasya lokam avāpnuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:525: ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayemahi // RBhrs_1,2.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:527: kṛṣṇottīrṇaṃ tu nirmālyaṃ yasyāṅgaṃ spṛśate mune /
GR14ruphbr_u:528: sarva-rogais tathā pāpair mukto bhavati nārada // RBhrs_1,2.126 //
GR14ruphbr_u:531: yo nṛtyati prahṛṣṭātmā bhāvair bahuṣu bhaktitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:532: sa nirdahati pāpāni manvantara-śateṣv api // RBhrs_1,2.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:544: yān ārūḍhaṃ puraḥ prekṣya samāyāntaṃ janārdanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:545: abhyutthānaṃ naraḥ kurvan pātayet sarva-kilbiṣam // RBhrs_1,2.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:548: viṣṇunaiva samāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapadādayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.131 //
GR14ruphbr_u:550: sthānaṃ tīrthaṃ gṛhaṃ cāsya tatra tīrthe gatir yathā // RBhrs_1,2.132 //
GR14ruphbr_u:553: slāghyau tāv eva caraṇau yau hares tīrtha-gāminau // RBhrs_1,2.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:556: na bhūyaḥ praviśen mātuḥ kukṣi-kārāgṛhaṃ sudhīḥ // RBhrs_1,2.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:559: tad evāvartanaṃ tasya punar nāvartate bhave // RBhrs_1,2.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:561: catur-vāraṃ bhramībhis tu jagat sarvaṃ carācaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:568: sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ mūlaṃ tāc-caraṇārcanaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:570: śrī-viṣṇor arcanaṃ ye tu prakurvanti narā bhuvi /
GR14ruphbr_u:571: te yānti śāśvataṃ viṣṇor ānandaṃ paramaṃ padam // RBhrs_1,2.139 //
GR14ruphbr_u:576: muhūrtaṃ vā muhūrtārdhaṃ yas tiṣṭhed dhari-mandire /
GR14ruphbr_u:577: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ kim u śuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.141 //
GR14ruphbr_u:584: na tāni likhitāny atra grantha-bāhulya-bhītitaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.143 //
GR14ruphbr_u:587: hareḥ sālokyam āpnoti rudra-gānādhikaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_1,2.144 //
GR14ruphbr_u:592: kṛṣṇeti maṅgalaṃ nāma yasya vāci pravartate /
GR14ruphbr_u:602: idaṃ hi puṃsas tapasaḥ śrutasya vā
GR14ruphbr_u:607: mantrasya sulaghūccāro japa ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_1,2.149 //
GR14ruphbr_u:609: kṛṣṇāya nama ity eṣa mantraḥ sarvārtha-sādhakaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:613: harim uddiśya yat kiñcit kṛtaṃ vijñāpanaṃ girā /
GR14ruphbr_u:614: mokṣa-dvārārgalān mokṣas tenaiva vihitas tava // RBhrs_1,2.151 //
GR14ruphbr_u:616: ity ādir vividhā dhīraiḥ kṛṣṇe vijñaptir īritā // RBhrs_1,2.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:619: yuvatīnāṃ yathā yūni yūnāṃ ca yuvatau yathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:623: mat-tulyo nāsti pāpātmā nāparādhī ca kaścana /
GR14ruphbr_u:624: parihāre 'pi lajjā me kiṃ brūve puruṣottama // RBhrs_1,2.154 //
GR14ruphbr_u:627: kadā gambhīrayā vācā śriyā yukto jagat-pate /
GR14ruphbr_u:628: cāmara-vyagra-hastaṃ mām evaṃ kurv iti vakṣyasi // RBhrs_1,2.155 //
GR14ruphbr_u:638: stotraiḥ stavaś ca devāgre yaḥ stauti madhusūdanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:648: na dānaṃ na havir yeṣāṃ svādhyāyo na surārcanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:649: te 'pi pādodakaṃ pītvā prayānti paramāṃ gatim // RBhrs_1,2.161 //
GR14ruphbr_u:664: pāpa-bandhair vinirmuktaḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // RBhrs_1,2.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:667: vṛndāvane tu govindaṃ ye paśyanti vasundhare /
GR14ruphbr_u:668: na te yama-puraṃ yānti yānti puṇya-kṛtāṃ gatim // RBhrs_1,2.166 //
GR14ruphbr_u:672: dahaty āloka-mātreṇa viṣṇoḥ sārātrikaṃ mukham // RBhrs_1,2.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:676: devatānāṃ gaṇāḥ sarve bhavanti śvapacādayaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.168 //
GR14ruphbr_u:679: pūjitaṃ pūjyamānaṃ vā yaḥ paśyed bhaktito harim // RBhrs_1,2.169 //
GR14ruphbr_u:685: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śrutvā mukto bhaven naraḥ // RBhrs_1,2.171 //
GR14ruphbr_u:690: tā ye pibanty avitṛṣo nṛpa gāḍha-karṇais
GR14ruphbr_u:703: jīveta yo mukti-pade sa dāya-bhāk // RBhrs_1,2.174 //
GR14ruphbr_u:705: yathā kathaṃ cin-manasā sambandhaḥ smṛtir ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:708: puruṣaṃ tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // RBhrs_1,2.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:710: prayāṇe cāprayāṇe ca yan-nāma smaratāṃ nṝṇām /
GR14ruphbr_u:711: sadyo naśyati pāpaugho namas tasmai cid-ātmane // RBhrs_1,2.177 //
GR14ruphbr_u:717: pāpino 'pi prasaṅgena vihitaṃ suhitaṃ param // RBhrs_1,2.179 //
GR14ruphbr_u:720: ye kurvanti sadā bhaktyā guṇānusmaraṇaṃ hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:721: prakṣīṇa-kaluṣaughās te praviśanti hareḥ padam // RBhrs_1,2.180 //
GR14ruphbr_u:725: dhyāyan hareś caritrāṇi lalitāni vimucyate // RBhrs_1,2.181 //
GR14ruphbr_u:729: pare vāṅ-manasā'gamyaṃ taṃ sākṣāt pratipedire // RBhrs_1,2.182 //
GR14ruphbr_u:731: dāsyaṃ karmārpaṇaṃ tasya kaiṅkaryam api sarvathā // RBhrs_1,2.183 //
GR14ruphbr_u:734: bhaved bhāgavato dharmas tat-karma kimutārpitam // RBhrs_1,2.184 //
GR14ruphbr_u:736: itīdaṃ dvividhaṃ kṛṣṇe vaiṣṇavair dāsyam arpitam // RBhrs_1,2.185 //
GR14ruphbr_u:738: tad-arpitaṃ harau dāsyam iti kaiścid udīryate // RBhrs_1,2.186 //
GR14ruphbr_u:740: īhā yasya harer dāsye karmaṇā manasā girā /
GR14ruphbr_u:741: nikhilāsv apy avasthāsu jīvan-muktaḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.187 //
GR14ruphbr_u:743: viśvāso mitra-vṛttiś ca sakhyaṃ dvividham īritam // RBhrs_1,2.188 //
GR14ruphbr_u:746: pratijñā tava govinda na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:747: iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya prāṇān saṃdhārayāmy aham // RBhrs_1,2.189 //
GR14ruphbr_u:752: lava-nimiṣārdham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāgryaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.190 //
GR14ruphbr_u:754: aṅgatvam asya viśvāsa-viśeṣasya tu keśave // RBhrs_1,2.191 //
GR14ruphbr_u:756: paricaryā parāḥ kecit prāsādeṣu ca śerate /
GR14ruphbr_u:757: manuṣyam iva taṃ draṣṭuṃ vyāvahartuṃ ca bandhuvat // RBhrs_1,2.192 //
GR14ruphbr_u:759: mārga-dvayena caitena sādhyā sakhya-ratir matā // RBhrs_1,2.193 //
GR14ruphbr_u:767: dehy-ahantāspadaṃ kaiścid dehaḥ kaiścin mamatva-bhāk // RBhrs_1,2.195 //
GR14ruphbr_u:774: cintāṃ kuryān na rakṣāyai vikrītasya yathā paśoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:775: tathārpayan harau dehaṃ viramed asya rakṣanāt // RBhrs_1,2.197 //
GR14ruphbr_u:777: keṣāṃcid eva dhīrāṇāṃ labhate sādhanārhatām // RBhrs_1,2.198 //
GR14ruphbr_u:780: yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:781: tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate // RBhrs_1,2.199 //
GR14ruphbr_u:784: laukikī vaidikī vāpi yā kriyā kriyate mune /
GR14ruphbr_u:785: hari-sevānukūlaiva sā kāryā bhaktim icchatā // RBhrs_1,2.200 //
GR14ruphbr_u:788: tavāsmīti vadan vācā tathaiva manasā vidan /
GR14ruphbr_u:789: tat-sthānam āśritas tanvā modate śaraṇāgataḥ // RBhrs_1,2.201 //
GR14ruphbr_u:792: iti yaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptas taṃ kleśād uddharāmy aham // RBhrs_1,2.202 //
GR14ruphbr_u:798: nyastā tac-caraṇe vimukti-phaladā tasyai tulasyai namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.203 //
GR14ruphbr_u:800: dṛṣtā spṛṣṭā tathā dhyātā kīrtitā namitā stutā /
GR14ruphbr_u:801: ropitā sevitā nityaṃ pūjitā tulasī śubhā // RBhrs_1,2.204 //
GR14ruphbr_u:802: navadhā tulasīṃ devīṃ ye bhajanti dine dine /
GR14ruphbr_u:803: yuga-koṭi-sahasrāṇi te vasanti harer gṛhe // RBhrs_1,2.205 //
GR14ruphbr_u:805: śāstram atra samākhyātaṃ yad bhakti-pratipādakam // RBhrs_1,2.206 //
GR14ruphbr_u:807: vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:808: dhanyās te mānavā loke tesāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prasīdati // RBhrs_1,2.207 //
GR14ruphbr_u:809: vaiṣṇavāni tu śāstrāṇī ye 'rcayanti gṛhe narāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:811: tiṣṭhate vaiṣṇavaṃ śāstraṃ likhitaṃ yasya mandire /
GR14ruphbr_u:812: tatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ svayaṃ vasati nārada // RBhrs_1,2.209 //
GR14ruphbr_u:815: tad-rasāmṛta-tṛptasya nānyatra syād ratiḥ kvacit // RBhrs_1,2.210 //
GR14ruphbr_u:818: mathurāṃ ca parityajya yo 'nyatra kurute ratim /
GR14ruphbr_u:819: mūḍho bhramati saṃsāre mohitā mama māyayā // RBhrs_1,2.211 //
GR14ruphbr_u:823: śrutā smṛtā kīrtitā ca vāñchitā prekṣitā gatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:824: spṛṣṭā śritā sevitā ca mathurābhīṣṭadā nṛṇām /
GR14ruphbr_u:825: iti khyātaṃ purāṇeṣu na vistāra-bhiyocyate // RBhrs_1,2.213 //
GR14ruphbr_u:829: tasmāt parataraṃ devi tadīyānāṃ samarcanam // RBhrs_1,2.214 //
GR14ruphbr_u:832: rati-rāso bhavet tīvraḥ pādayor vyasanārdanaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.215 //
GR14ruphbr_u:835: gopī-candana-liptāṅgo dṛṣtaś cet tad-aghaṃ kutaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.216 //
GR14ruphbr_u:837: yeṣāṃ saṃsmaraṇāt puṃsāṃ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:840: ye me bhakta-janāḥ pārtha na me bhaktāś ca te janāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:841: mad-bhaktānāṃ ca ye bhaktās te me bhaktatamā matāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.218 //
GR14ruphbr_u:843: prāyas tāvanti tad-bhakta-bhakter api budhā viduḥ // RBhrs_1,2.219 //
GR14ruphbr_u:846: yaḥ karoti mahīpāla harer gehe mahotsavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:847: tasyāpi bhavati nityaṃ hari-loke mahotsava // RBhrs_1,2.220 //
GR14ruphbr_u:851: tasyāyaṃ tādṛśo māsaḥ svalpam apy uru-kārakaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.221 //
GR14ruphbr_u:854: bhuktiṃ muktiṃ harir dadyād arcito 'nyatra sevinām /
GR14ruphbr_u:855: bhaktiṃ tu na dadāty eva yato vaśyakarī hareḥ // RBhrs_1,2.222 //
GR14ruphbr_u:856: sā tv añjasā harer bhaktir labhyate kārttike naraiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:860: yasmin dine prasūteyaṃ devakī tvāṃ janārdana /
GR14ruphbr_u:861: tad-dinaṃ brūhi vaikuṇṭha kurmas te tatra cotsavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:862: tena samyak-prapannānāṃ prasādaṃ kuru keśavaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.224 //
GR14ruphbr_u:866: bhaktis tasmai pradātavyā na tu muktiḥ kadācana // RBhrs_1,2.225 //
GR14ruphbr_u:872: muhur aho rasikā bhuvi bhāvukāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.226 //
GR14ruphbr_u:875: gṛhita-cetā rājarṣe ākhyānaṃ yad adhītavān // RBhrs_1,2.227 //
GR14ruphbr_u:881: yasya yat-saṅgatiḥ puṃso maṇivat syāt sa tad-guṇaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:882: sva-kūlarddhyai tato dhīmān sva-yūthyān eva saṃśrayet // RBhrs_1,2.229 //
GR14ruphbr_u:886: yogināṃ nṛpa nirṇītaṃ harer nāmānukīrtanaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.230 //
GR14ruphbr_u:888: gītvā ca mama nāmāni vicaren mama sannidhau /
GR14ruphbr_u:889: iti bravīmi te satyaṃ krīto 'haṃ tasya cārjuna // RBhrs_1,2.231 //
GR14ruphbr_u:892: tan-mukhe hari-nāmāni sadā tiṣṭhanti bhārata // RBhrs_1,2.232 //
GR14ruphbr_u:896: ataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-nāmādi na bhaved grāhyaṃ indriyaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:897: sevonmukhe hi jihvādau svayam eva sphuraty adaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.234 //
GR14ruphbr_u:901: muktaiḥ prārthyā harer bhaktir mathurāyāṃ tu labhyate // RBhrs_1,2.235 //
GR14ruphbr_u:902: tri-vargadā kāmināṃ yā mumukṣūṇāṃ ca mokṣadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:903: bhaktīcchor bhaktidā kas tāṃ mathurāṃ nāśrayed budhaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.236 //
GR14ruphbr_u:904: aho madhu-purī dhanyā vaikuṇṭhāc ca garīyasī /
GR14ruphbr_u:905: dinam ekaṃ nivāsena harau bhaktiḥ prajāyate // RBhrs_1,2.237 //
GR14ruphbr_u:907: yatra svalpo 'pi sambandhaḥ sad-dhiyāṃ bhāva-janmane // RBhrs_1,2.238 //
GR14ruphbr_u:912: mā prekṣiṣṭhās tava yadi sakhe bandhu-sange 'sti raṅgaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.239 //
GR14ruphbr_u:917: yad garhantaḥ sukhamayam amī mokṣam apy ākṣipanti // RBhrs_1,2.240 //
GR14ruphbr_u:920: skhalann antaḥ-phullo dadhad atipṛthuṃ vepathum api /
GR14ruphbr_u:921: dṛśoḥ kakṣāṃ yāvan mama sa puruṣaḥ ko 'py upayayau
GR14ruphbr_u:922: na jāte kiṃ tāvan matir iha gṛhe nābhiramate // RBhrs_1,2.241 //
GR14ruphbr_u:932: manasi kam api bhāvaṃ kānana-śrīs tanoti // RBhrs_1,2.243 //
GR14ruphbr_u:934: bhāvaṃ tad-viṣayaṃ cāpi yā sahaiva prakāśayet // RBhrs_1,2.244 //
GR14ruphbr_u:935: keṣāṃcit kvacid aṅgānāṃ yat kṣudraṃ śrūyate phalaṃ /
GR14ruphbr_u:936: bahir-mukha-pravṛttyaitat kintu mukhyaṃ phalaṃ ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.245 //
GR14ruphbr_u:937: saṃmataṃ bhakti-vijñānāṃ bhakty-aṅgatvaṃ na karmaṇām // RBhrs_1,2.246 //
GR14ruphbr_u:939: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:940: mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate // RBhrs_1,2.247 //
GR14ruphbr_u:942: īṣat prathamam eveti nāṅgatvam ucitaṃ tayoḥ // RBhrs_1,2.248 //
GR14ruphbr_u:943: yad ubhe citta-kāṭhinya-hetū prāyaḥ satāṃ mate /
GR14ruphbr_u:947: na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha // RBhrs_1,2.250 //
GR14ruphbr_u:950: yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgya taś ca yat /
GR14ruphbr_u:951: yogena dāna dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api // RBhrs_1,2.252 //
GR14ruphbr_u:953: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // RBhrs_1,2.253 //
GR14ruphbr_u:954: rucim udvahatas tatra janasya bhajane hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:955: viṣayeṣu gariṣṭho 'pi rāgaḥ prāyo vilīyate // RBhrs_1,2.254 //
GR14ruphbr_u:957: nirbandhaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhe yuktaṃ vairāgyam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.255 //
GR14ruphbr_u:959: mumukṣubhiḥ parityāgo vairāgyaṃ phalgu kathyate // RBhrs_1,2.256 //
GR14ruphbr_u:963: spaṣṭatārthaṃ punar api tad evedaṃ nirākṛtaṃ // RBhrs_1,2.258 //
GR14ruphbr_u:965: vidūratvād uttamatā-hānyā tasyāś ca nāṅgatā // RBhrs_1,2.259 //
GR14ruphbr_u:967: vivekādīny ato 'mīṣām api nāṅgatvam ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.260 //
GR14ruphbr_u:968: kṛṣṇonmukhaṃ svayaṃ yānti yamāḥ śaucādayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:969: ity eṣāṃ ca na yuktā syād bhakty-aṅgāntara-pātitā // RBhrs_1,2.261 //
GR14ruphbr_u:971: ete na hy adbhutā vyādha tavāhiṃsādayo guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:972: hari-bhaktau pravṛttā ye na te syuḥ para-tāpinaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.262 //
GR14ruphbr_u:980: śrī viṣṇoḥ śravaṇe parīkṣid abhavad vaiyāsakiḥ kīrtane
GR14ruphbr_u:981: prahlādaḥ smaraṇe tad-aṅghri-bhajane lakṣmīḥ pṛthuḥ pūjane /
GR14ruphbr_u:982: akrūras tv abhivandane kapi-patir dāsye 'tha sakhye 'rjunaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:983: sarvasvātma-nivedane balir abhūt kṛṣṇāptir eṣāṃ parā // RBhrs_1,2.265 //
GR14ruphbr_u:995: kāmaṃ ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā
GR14ruphbr_u:998: vaidhi bhaktir iyaṃ kaiścan maryādā-mārga ucyate // RBhrs_1,2.269 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1001: rāgātmikām anusṛtā yā sā rāgānugocyate // RBhrs_1,2.270 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1004: tan-mayī yā bhaved bhaktiḥ sātra rāgātmikoditā // RBhrs_1,2.272 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1005: sā kāmarūpā sambandha-rūpā ceti bhaved dvidhā // RBhrs_1,2.273 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1007: kāmād dveṣād bhayāt snehād yathā bhaktyeśvare manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1008: āveśya tad aghaṃ hitvā bahavas tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.274 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1009: gopyaḥ kāmād bhayāt kaṃso dveṣāc caidyādayo nṛpāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1010: sambandhād vṛṣṇayaḥ snehād yūyaṃ bhaktyā vayaṃ vibho // RBhrs_1,2.275 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1015: bhaktyā vayam iti vyaktaṃ vaidhī bhaktir udīritā // RBhrs_1,2.277 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1016: yad-arīṇāṃ priyāṇāṃ ca prāpyam ekam ivoditam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1018: brahmaṇy eva layaṃ yānti prāyeṇa ripavo hareḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1019: kecit prāpyāpi sārūpyābhāsaṃ majjanti tat-sukhe // RBhrs_1,2.279 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1021: siddha-lokas tu tamasaḥ pāre yatra vasanti hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:1022: siddhā brahma-sukhe magnā daityāś ca hariṇa hatāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.280 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1023: rāga-bandhena kenāpi taṃ bhajanto vrajanty amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:1024: aṅghri-padma-sudhāḥ prema-rūpās tasya priyā janāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.281 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1029: vayam api te samāḥ sama-dṛśo 'ṅghri-saroja-sudhāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.282 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1031: sā kāmarūpā sambhoga-tṛṣṇāṃ yā nayati svatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:1032: yad asyāṃ kṛṣṇa-saukhyārtham eva kevalam udyamaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.283 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1034: āsāṃ prema-viśeṣo 'yaṃ prāptaḥ kām api mādhurīṃ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1035: tat-tat-krīḍā-nidānatvāt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.284 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1037: premaiva gopa-rāmāṇāṃ kāma ity agamat prathām // RBhrs_1,2.285 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1038: ity uddhavādayo 'py etaṃ vāñchati bhagavat-priyāḥ // RBhrs_1,2.286 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1039: kāma-prāyā ratiḥ kintu kubjāyām eva sammatā // RBhrs_1,2.287 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1046: rāgātmikāyā dvaividhyād dvidhā rāgānugā ca sā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1047: kāmānugā ca sambandhānugā ceti nigadyate // RBhrs_1,2.290 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1050: teṣāṃ bhāvāptaye lubdho bhaved atrādhikāravān // RBhrs_1,2.291 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1052: nātra śāstraṃ na yuktiṃ ca tal-lobhotpatti-lakṣaṇam // RBhrs_1,2.292 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1054: atra śāstraṃ tathā tarkam anukūlam apekṣate // RBhrs_1,2.293 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1055: kṛṣṇaṃ smaran janaṃ cāsya preṣṭhaṃ nija-samīhitam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1056: tat-tat-kathā-rataś cāsau kuryād vāsaṃ vraje sadā // RBhrs_1,2.294 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1060: yāny aṅgāni ca tāny atra vijñeyāni manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_1,2.296 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1066: śrī-mūrter mādhurīṃ prekṣya tat-tal-līlāṃ niśamya vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1068: purāṇe śruyate pādme puṃsam api bhaved iyam // RBhrs_1,2.300 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1071: dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ hariṃ tatra bhoktum aicchan suvigraham // RBhrs_1,2.301 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1072: te sarve strītvam āpannāḥ samudbhūtāś ca gokule /
GR14ruphbr_u:1073: hariṃ samprāpya kāmena tato muktā bhavārṇavāt // RBhrs_1,2.302 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1074: riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1075: kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure // RBhrs_1,2.303 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1078: bhartāraṃ ca jagad-yoniṃ vāsudevam ajaṃ vibhum // RBhrs_1,2.304 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1080: sā sambandhānugā bhaktiḥ procyate sadbhir ātmani /
GR14ruphbr_u:1084: tathā hi śruyate śāstre kaścit kurupurī-sthitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1089: ye dhyāyanti sadodyuktās tebhyo 'pīha namo namaḥ // RBhrs_1,2.308 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1098: rucibhiś citta-māsṛṇya-kṛd asau bhāva ucyate // RBhrs_1,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1100: premṇas tu prathamāvasthā bhāva ity abhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1107: vastutaḥ svayam āsvāda-svarūpaiva ratis tv asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:1111: ādyas tu prāyikas tatra dvitīyo viralodayaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1116: harāv āsaktim utpādya ratiṃ saṃjanayaty asau // RBhrs_1,3.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1121: priya-śravasy aṅga mamābhavad ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.9 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:1122: ratyā tu bhāva evātra na tu premābhidhīyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1123: mama bhaktiḥ pravṛtteti vakṣyate sa yad agrataḥ // RBhrs_1,3.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1134: purāṇe nātya-śāstre ca dvayos tu rati-bhāvayoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1135: samānārthatayā hy atra dvayam aikyena lakṣitam // RBhrs_1,3.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1137: itthaṃ manorathaṃ bālā kurvatī nṛtya utsukā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1138: hari-prītyā ca tāṃ sarvāṃ rātrim evātyavāhayat // RBhrs_1,3.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1147: dvijendra tava mayy astu bhaktir avyābhicāriṇī // RBhrs_1,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1153: prasāda āntaro yaḥ syāt sa hārda iti kathyate // RBhrs_1,3.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1159: guṇair alam asaṅkhyeyair mahātmyaṃ tasya sūcyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1160: vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1162: nisargaḥ saiva tenātra ratir naisargikī matā // RBhrs_1,3.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1164: aho dhanyo 'si devarṣe kṛpayā yasya tat-kṣaṇāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:1165: nīco 'py utpulako lebhe lubdhako ratim acyute // RBhrs_1,3.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1166: bhaktānāṃ bhedataḥ seyaṃ ratiḥ pañca-vidhā matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1167: agre vivicya vaktavyā tena nātra prapañcyate // RBhrs_1,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1169: āśā-bandhaḥ samutkaṇṭhā nāma-gāne sadā ruciḥ // RBhrs_1,3.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1171: ity ādayo 'nubhāvāḥ syur jāta-bhāvāṅkure jane // RBhrs_1,3.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1173: kṣobha-hetāv api prāpte kṣāntir akṣubhitātmatā // RBhrs_1,3.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1186: viraktir indriyārthānāṃ syād arocakatā svayaṃ // RBhrs_1,3.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1188: yo dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛd rājyaṃ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1193: harau ratiṃ vahann eṣa narendrāṇāṃ śikhā-maṇiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1194: bhikṣām aṭann ari-pure śvapākam api vandate // RBhrs_1,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1198: na premā śravaṇādi-bhaktir api vā yogo 'thavā vaiṣṇavo
GR14ruphbr_u:1199: jñānaṃ vā śubha-karma vā kiyad aho saj-jātir apy asti vā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1201: he gopī-jana-vallabha vyathayate hā hā mad-āśaiva mām // RBhrs_1,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1206: ālolām anurāgiṇor nayanayor ārdrāṃ mṛdau jalpite /
GR14ruphbr_u:1208: āśāste mama locanaṃ vraja-śiśor-mūrtiṃ jagan-mohinīm // RBhrs_1,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1211: tava madhura-svara-kaṇṭhī gāyati nāmāvalīṃ bālā // RBhrs_1,3.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1217: ceto bata harati hanta kiṃ kurmaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1219: yathā padyāvalyām {*Not found in my edition.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:1223: ānandāśru-dharaḥ kadā madhu-purīṃ dhanyaś cariṣyāmy aham // RBhrs_1,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1226: mumukṣu-prabhṛtīnāṃ ced bhaved eṣā ratir na hi // RBhrs_1,3.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1228: yā kṛṣṇenātigopyāśu bhajadbhyo 'pi na dīyate // RBhrs_1,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1230: hṛdaye sambhavaty eṣāṃ kathaṃ bhāgavatī ratiḥ // RBhrs_1,3.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1233: pratibimbas tathā cchāyā raty-ābhāso dvidhā mataḥ // RBhrs_1,3.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1243: rateś chāyā bhavet kiṃcit tat-sādṛśyāvalambinī // RBhrs_1,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1245: apy ānuṣaṅgikād eṣa kvacid ajñeṣv apīkṣyate // RBhrs_1,3.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1246: kintu bhāgyaṃ vinā nāsau bhāva-cchāyāpy udañcati /
GR14ruphbr_u:1247: yad abhyudayataḥ kṣemaṃ tatra syād uttarottaram // RBhrs_1,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1251: krameṇa kṣayam āpnoti kha-sthaḥ pūrṇa-śaśī yathā // RBhrs_1,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1254: ābhāsatāṃ ca śanakair nyūna-jātīyatām api // RBhrs_1,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1256: ābhāsatām asau kiṃ vā bhajanīyeśa-bhāvatām // RBhrs_1,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1257: ata eva kvacit teṣu navya-bhakteṣu dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1259: sādhanekṣāṃ vinā yasminn akasmād bhāva īkṣyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1262: yaḥ prathīyān bhaved bhāvaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇa-prasādajaḥ // RBhrs_1,3.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1263: jane cej jāta-bhāve 'pi vaiguṇyam iva dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1264: kāryā tathāpi nāsūyā kṛtārthaḥ sarvathaiva saḥ // RBhrs_1,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1271: uṣmāṇam api vamantī sudhāṃśu-koṭer api svādvī // RBhrs_1,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1278: bhāvaḥ sa eva sāndrātmā budhaiḥ premā nigadyate // RBhrs_1,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1282: bhaktiḥ premocyate bhīṣma-mukhyair yatra tu saṅgatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1284: bhāvottho 'ti-prasādotthaḥ śrī-harer iti sa dvidhā // RBhrs_1,4.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1296: na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1305: māhātmya-jñāna-yuktaś ca kevalaś ceti sa dvidhā // RBhrs_1,4.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1308: sneho bhaktir iti proktas tayā sārṣṭyādinānyathā // RBhrs_1,4.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1313: rāgānugāśritānāṃ tu prāyaśaḥ kevalo bhavet // RBhrs_1,4.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1315: tato 'nartha-nivṛttiḥ syāt tato niṣṭhā rucis tataḥ // RBhrs_1,4.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1317: sādhakānām ayaṃ premnaḥ prādurbhāve bhavet kramaḥ // RBhrs_1,4.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1319: antarvāṇībhir apy asya mudrā suṣṭhu sudurgamā // RBhrs_1,4.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1321: bhāvonmatto hareḥ kiñcin na veda sukham ātmanaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1322: dukhaṃ ceti maheśāni paramānanda āplutaḥ // RBhrs_1,4.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1323: premṇa eva vilāsatvād vairalyāt sādhakeṣv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:1324: atra snehādayo bhedā vivicya na hi śaṃsitāḥ // RBhrs_1,4.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1342: agha-damano mathurāyāṃ sadā sanātana-tanur jayati // RBhrs_2,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1345: asya pañca laharyaḥ syur vibhāvākhyāgrimā matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:1347: vyabhicāry-abhidhā turyā sthāyi-saṃjñā ca pañcamī // RBhrs_2,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1352: eṣā kṛṣṇa-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvo bhakti-raso bhavet // RBhrs_2,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1354: eṣa bhakti-rasāsvādas tasyaiva hṛdi jāyate // RBhrs_2,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1360: ratir ānanda-rūpaiva nīyamānā tu rasyatām // RBhrs_2,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1363: kintu premā vibhāvādyaiḥ svalpair nīto 'py aṇīyasīm /
GR14ruphbr_u:1364: vibhāvanādy-avasthāṃ tu sadya āsvādyatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_2,1.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1367: kārya-bhūtāḥ smitādyāś ca tathāṣṭau stabdhatādayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1368: nirvedādyāḥ sahāyāś ca te jñeyā rasa-bhāvane /
GR14ruphbr_u:1369: vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1372: te dvidhālambanā eke tathaivoddīpanāḥ pare // RBhrs_2,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1374: vibhāvyate hi raty-ādir yatra yena vibhāvyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:1377: kṛṣṇaś ca kṛṣṇa-bhaktāś ca budhair ālambanā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1380: nāyakānāṃ śiro-ratnaṃ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1389: āvṛtaṃ prakaṭaṃ ceti svarūpaṃ kathitaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1401: karoty uccair modaṃ mama madhura-mūrtir madhuripuḥ // RBhrs_2,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1404: ruciras tejasā yukto balīyān vayasānvitaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1409: sthiro dāntaḥ kṣamā-śīlo gambhīro dhṛtimān samaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1410: vadānyo dhārmikaḥ śūraḥ karuṇo mānya-mānakṛt // RBhrs_2,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1416: samudrā iva pañcāśad durvigāhā harer amī // RBhrs_2,1.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1419: tathā hi pādme pārvatyai śiti-kaṇṭhena tad-guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1421: eta eva guṇāḥ prāyo dharmāya vana-mālinaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1424: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1425: śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṃ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam // RBhrs_2,1.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1426: jñānaṃ viraktir aiśvaryaṃ śauryaṃ tejo balaṃ smṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1427: svātantryaṃ kauśalaṃ kāntir dhairyaṃ mārdavam eva ca // RBhrs_2,1.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1428: prāgalbhyaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ saha ojo balaṃ bhagaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1429: gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyam āstikyaṃ kīrtir māno 'nahaṅkṛtiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1430: ime cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1431: prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit // RBhrs_2,1.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1432: atha pañca-guṇā ye syur aṃśena giriśādiṣu // RBhrs_2,1.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1444: ity asādhāraṇaṃ proktaṃ govindasya catuṣṭayam // RBhrs_2,1.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1446: sodāharaṇam eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate kramāt // RBhrs_2,1.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1448: ślāghyāṅga-sanniveśo yaḥ suramyāṅgaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1453: parikṣāmo madhyaḥ sphurati murahantur madhurimā // RBhrs_2,1.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1455: tanau guṇottham aṅkottham iti sal-lakṣaṇaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1457: guṇotthaṃ syād guṇair yogo raktatā-tuṅgatādibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1459: rāgaḥ saptasu hanta ṣaṭsv api śiśor aṅgeṣv alaṃ tuṅgatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1460: visāras triṣu kharvatā triṣu tathā gambhīratā ca triṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:1461: dairghyaṃ pañcasu kiṃ ca pañcasu sakhe samprekṣyate sūkṣmatā
GR14ruphbr_u:1462: dvātriṃśad-vara-lakṣaṇaḥ katham asau gopeṣu sambhāvyate // RBhrs_2,1.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1464: rekhāmayaṃ rathāṅgādi syād aṅkotthaṃ karādiṣu // RBhrs_2,1.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1483: tejo dhāma prabhāvaś cety ucyate dvividhaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1488: hari-vakṣasi ruci-niviḍe maṇirāḍ ayam uḍur iva sphurati // RBhrs_2,1.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1497: prāṇena mahatā pūrṇo balīyān iti kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1504: vāmas tāmarasākṣasya bhuja-daṇḍaḥ sa pātu vaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1505: krīḍā-kandukatāṃ yena nīto govardhano giriḥ // RBhrs_2,1.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1513: murārer mādhuryaṃ manasi madirākṣīr madayati // RBhrs_2,1.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1515: vividhādbhuta-bhāṣāvit sa prokto yas tu kovidaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1516: nānā-deśyāsu bhāṣāsu saṃskṛte prākṛteṣu ca // RBhrs_2,1.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1523: syān nānṛtaṃ vaco yasya satya-vākyaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,1.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1526: raṇorvaritam ity abhūt tava yathārtham evoditam /
GR14ruphbr_u:1527: ravir bhavati śītalaḥ kumuda-bandhur apy uṣṇalas
GR14ruphbr_u:1528: tathāpi na murāntaka vyabhicariṣṇur uktis tava // RBhrs_2,1.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1533: māṃ viddhi kṛṣṇaṃ bhavataḥ sapatnam // RBhrs_2,1.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1543: iti dvidhā nigadito vāvadūko manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1553: hari-vāg iyaṃ mama dhinoti dhiyaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1555: vidvān nītijña ity eṣa supaṇḍityo dvidhā mataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:1556: vidvān akhila-vidyā-vin nītijñas tu yathārha-kṛt // RBhrs_2,1.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1565: tvāṃ labdhāvasarā cirād gurukule prekṣya svasaṅgārthinaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1566: vidyā nāma vadhūś caturdaśa-guṇā govinda śuśrūyate // RBhrs_2,1.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1571: śāsti svasti-dhurandharo madhupurīṃ nītyā madhūnāṃ patiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1573: medhāvī sūkṣmadhīś ceti procyate buddhimān dvidhā // RBhrs_2,1.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1576: guror jagati darśayan samayam atra vidyārthinām /
GR14ruphbr_u:1578: dadhau hṛdaya-mandire kim api citravan mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1580: yadubhir ayam avadhyo mleccha-rājas tad enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1583: jhara-muci mucukundaḥ kandare yatra śete // RBhrs_2,1.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1587: vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1589: yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
GR14ruphbr_u:1590: śaurir gopa-vadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃ-vidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1594: gītaṃ gumphati tāṇḍavaṃ ghaṭayati brūte prahelī-kramaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:1595: veṇuṃ vādayate srajaṃ viracayaty ālekhyam abhyasyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:1596: nirmāti svayam indrajāla-paṭalīṃ dyūte jayaty unmadān
GR14ruphbr_u:1606: duṣkare kṣipra-kārī yas taṃ dakṣaṃ paricakṣate // RBhrs_2,1.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1609: haris tāny acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair ekaika-śastribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1614: dadṛśur adhikam etās taṃ yathā sva-sva-pārśve // RBhrs_2,1.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1616: kṛtajñaḥ syād abhijño yaḥ kṛta-sevādi-karmaṇām // RBhrs_2,1.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:1617: yathā mahābhārate {*Not found in critical edition.}--

GR14ruphbr_u:2256: udañcad-romāñcaṃ racayati ca kṛṣṇaḥ parikaram // RBhrs_2,1.268 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2260: vadānyaḥ ko bhaved atra vadānyaḥ puruṣottamāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:2262: sāmānyā nāyaka-guṇāḥ sthiratādyā yad apy amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2263: tathāpi pūrvataḥ kiñcid viśeṣāt punar īritāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.271 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2266: uddhavādyās tathā mantre sahāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.272 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2269: yo satya-vākya ity ādyā hrīmān ity antimā guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2270: proktāḥ kṛṣṇe 'sya bhakteṣu te vijñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.274 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2271: te sādhakāś ca siddhāś ca dvi-vidhāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.275 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2277: prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.277 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2280: tiṣṭhaty eva bhavāgni-hetir iti te dhīmann alaṃ cintayā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2283: bilvamaṅgala-tulyā ye sādhakās te prakīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.279 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2287: samprāpta-siddhayaḥ siddhā nitya-siddhāś ca te tridhā // RBhrs_2,1.281 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2289: sādhanaiḥ kṛpayā cāsya dvidhā samprāpta-siddhayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.282 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2293: dūre yamā hy upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya-śīlāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2300: nirdhautāsya-taṭān muhuḥ pulakino dhanyān namaskurmahe // RBhrs_2,1.284 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2304: nāsāṃ dvijāti-saṃskāro na nivāso gurāv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:2305: na tapo nātma-mīmāṃsā na śaucaṃ na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.286 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2307: bhaktir dṛḍhā na cāsmākaṃ saṃskārādimatām api // RBhrs_2,1.287 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2310: na sādhana-vidhau ca te śrama-lavasya gandho 'py abhūt /
GR14ruphbr_u:2319: āgato 'haṃ gaṇāḥ sarve jātās te 'pi mayā saha // RBhrs_2,1.291 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2320: ete hi yādavāḥ sarve mad-gaṇā eva bhāmini /
GR14ruphbr_u:2324: yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam // RBhrs_2,1.293 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2327: nanda te tanaye 'smāsu tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham // RBhrs_2,1.294 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2328: sanātanaṃ mitram iti tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham /
GR14ruphbr_u:2329: sneho 'smāsv iti caiteṣāṃ nitya-preṣṭhatvam āgatam // RBhrs_2,1.295 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2331: eṣāṃ laukikavac-ceṣṭā līlā mura-ripor iva // RBhrs_2,1.296 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2334: tathā tenaiva jāyante nija-lokād yadṛcchayā // RBhrs_2,1.297 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2335: punas tenaiva gacchanti tat-padaṃ śāśvataṃ param /
GR14ruphbr_u:2336: na karma-bandhanaṃ janma vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca vidyate // RBhrs_2,1.298 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2337: ye proktāḥ pañca-pañcāśat kramāt kaṃsaripor guṇāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2338: te cānye cāpi siddheṣu siddhidatvādayo matāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.299 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2339: bhaktās tu kīrtitāḥ śāntās tathā dāsa-sutādayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2340: sakhāyo guru-vargāś ca preyasyaś ceti pañcadhā // RBhrs_2,1.300 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2342: uddīpanās tu te proktā bhāvam uddīpayanti ye /
GR14ruphbr_u:2343: te tu śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasya guṇāś ceṣṭāḥ prasādhanam // RBhrs_2,1.301 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2347: guṇās tu trividhāḥ proktāḥ kāya-vāṅ-mānasāśrayāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.303 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2350: guṇāḥ svarūpam evāsya kāyikādyā yadapy amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2351: bhedaṃ svīkṛtya varṇyante tathāpy uddīpanā iti // RBhrs_2,1.305 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2352: atas tasya svarūpasya syād ālambanataiva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2353: uddīpanatvam eva syād bhūṣaṇādes tu kevalam // RBhrs_2,1.306 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2354: eṣām ālambanatvaṃ ca tathoddīpanatāpi ca // RBhrs_2,1.307 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2356: vayaḥ kaumāra-paugaṇḍa-kaiśoram iti tat tridhā // RBhrs_2,1.308 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2358: ā-ṣoḍaśāc ca kaiśoraṃ yauvanaṃ syāt tataḥ param // RBhrs_2,1.309 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2359: aucityāt tatra kaumāraṃ vaktavyaṃ vatsale rase /
GR14ruphbr_u:2361: śraiṣṭhyam ujjvala evāsya kaiśorasya tathāpy adaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2363: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaiśoraṃ trividhaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_2,1.312 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2369: praviśati dṛśor ante kāntir manāg iva lohinī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2370: sakhi tanu- ruhāṃ rājiḥ sūkṣmā darāsya virohate
GR14ruphbr_u:2371: sphurati suṣamā navyedānīṃ tanau vana-mālinaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.314 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2380: radānāṃ rañjanaṃ rāga-cūrṇair ity ādi ceṣṭitam // RBhrs_2,1.317 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2383: śarālir iva śāṇitā nakhara-rājir agre kharā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2385: na kā sakhi samīkṣaṇād yuvatir asya vitrasyati // RBhrs_2,1.318 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2387: kartuṃ mugdhāḥ svayam acaṭunā na kṣamante 'bhiyogaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2388: na vyādātuṃ kvacid api jane vaktram apy utsahante /
GR14ruphbr_u:2390: sva-prāṇebhyas trayam udasṛjann adya toyāñjalīnām // RBhrs_2,1.319 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2392: ūru-dvayasya bāhvoś ca kāpi śrīr urasas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2393: mūrter mādhurimādyaṃ ca kaiśore sati madhyame // RBhrs_2,1.320 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2400: tri-jagan-mohanaṃ gītam ity ādir iha mādhurī // RBhrs_2,1.322 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2405: hares taruṇimāṅkure sphurati mādhurī kāpy abhūt // RBhrs_2,1.323 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2412: govindasya vilāsa-vṛndam adhikaṃ vṛndāṭavī śaṃsati // RBhrs_2,1.325 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2416: kathaṃ hā nas trāṇaṃ sakhi mukulayan bodha-kumudaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2420: tri-vali-vyaktir ity ādyaṃ kaiśore carame sati // RBhrs_2,1.327 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2431: idam eva hareḥ prājñair nava-yauvanam ucyate // RBhrs_2,1.330 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2435: kāntābhiḥ kalahāyate kvacid ayaṃ kandarpa-lekhān kvacit
GR14ruphbr_u:2438: sandhiṃ kvāpy anuśāsti kuñja-nṛpatiḥ śṛṅgāra-rājyottamam // RBhrs_2,1.332 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2443: kaiśoreṇa tavādya kṛṣṇa guruṇā gaurī-gaṇaḥ paṭhyate // RBhrs_2,1.333 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2445: netuḥ svarūpam evoktaṃ kaiśoram iha yadyapi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2448: tan nātirasa-vāhitvān na rasajñair udāhṛtam // RBhrs_2,1.335 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2450: bhavet saundaryam aṅgānāṃ sanniveśo yathocitam // RBhrs_2,1.336 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2455: na kasyāḥ kaṃsāre harati hṛdayaṃ paṅkaja-dṛśaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.337 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2457: vibhūṣaṇaṃ vibhūṣyaṃ syād yena tad rūpam ucyate // RBhrs_2,1.338 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2461: śaktā babhūva na manāg api tad-vidhāne
GR14ruphbr_u:2462: sā pratyuta svayam analpam alaṅkṛtāsīt // RBhrs_2,1.339 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2467: api nava-pallava-saṅgād aṅgāny aparajya śīryanti // RBhrs_2,1.341 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2469: guṇāḥ proktānta evātra jñeyā uddīpanā budhaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.342 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2471: ceṣṭā rāsādi-līlāḥ syus tathā duṣṭa-vadhādayaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.343 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2476: rāsārambha-rasārthino madhurimā cetāṃsi naḥ karṣati // RBhrs_2,1.344 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2480: mlānaḥ salīlam api yatra śiro dhunāne /
GR14ruphbr_u:2482: taṃ duṣṭa-puṅgavam asau harir unmamātha // RBhrs_2,1.345 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2487: yugaṃ catuṣkaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vasanaṃ tri-vidhaṃ hareḥ // RBhrs_2,1.347 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2493: priyam iva kila varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2500: uṣṇīṣaṃ dadhad aruṇaṃ dhaṭīṃ ca citrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:2501: kaṃsārir vahati mahotsave mudaṃ naḥ // RBhrs_2,1.351 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2504: aneka-varṇaṃ vasanaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.352 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2509: karoti karabhoru me ghana-rucir mudaṃ mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.353 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2513: syāj jūṭaḥ kavarī cūḍā veṇī ca kaca-bandhanam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2514: pāṇḍuraḥ karburaḥ pīta ity ālepas tridhā mataḥ // RBhrs_2,1.355 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2518: tathā viśeṣako 'pi syād anyad ūhyaṃ svayaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,1.357 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2523: śyāmāṅga-dyutir adya me sakhi dṛśor dugdhe mudaṃ mādhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.358 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2528: kāñcī citrā mukuṭam atulaṃ kuṇḍale hāri-hīre
GR14ruphbr_u:2529: hāras tāro valayam amalaṃ candrā-cāruś catuṣkī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2530: ramyā cormir madhurima-pūre nūpure cety aghārer
GR14ruphbr_u:2531: aṅgair evābharaṇa-paṭalī bhūṣitā dogdhi bhūṣām // RBhrs_2,1.360 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2542: pulakayati vapur naḥ kāpy apūrvā munīnām /
GR14ruphbr_u:2550: eṣa tridhā bhaved veṇu-muralī-vaṃśikety api // RBhrs_2,1.365 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2553: sthaulye 'ṅguṣṭha-mitaḥ ṣaḍbhir eṣa randhraiḥ samanvitaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.366 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2559: tataḥ sārdhāṅgulād yatra mukha-randhraṃ tathāṅgulam // RBhrs_2,1.368 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2560: śiro vedāṅgulaṃ pucchaṃ try-aṅgulaṃ sā tu vaṃśikā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2563: mahānandeti vyākhyātā tathā saṃmohinīti ca // RBhrs_2,1.370 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2564: bhavet sūryāntarā sā cet tata ākarṣiṇī matā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2565: ānandinī tadā vaṃśī bhaved indrāntarā yadi // RBhrs_2,1.371 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2566: gopānāṃ vallabhā seyaṃ vaṃśulīti ca viśrutā /
GR14ruphbr_u:2567: kramān maṇimayī haimī vaiṇavīti tridhā ca sā // RBhrs_2,1.372 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2580: bahir adya hanta guravaḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ // RBhrs_2,1.375 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2593: prabhor amūny aṅghri-rajāṃsy aho iti // RBhrs_2,1.378 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2603: praviśan nāma mano dhinoti naḥ // RBhrs_2,1.380 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2605: yathā bilvamaṅgale {*Not in any of the KK centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:2620: kathaya sa dayitas te kvāyam āste vayasyaḥ // RBhrs_2,1.383 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2631: te bahir vikriyā prāyāḥ proktā udbhāsvarākhyayā // RBhrs_2,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2635: te śītāḥ kṣepaṇāś ceti yathārthākhyā dvidhoditāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2636: śītāḥ syur gīta-jṛmbhādyā nṛtyādyāḥ kṣepaṇābhidhāḥ // RBhrs_2,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2690: aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagad-gurau /
GR14ruphbr_u:2698: śaṅke prema-bhujaṅgena daṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ gato muniḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2699: niścalasya yad etasya lālā sravati vaktrataḥ // RBhrs_2,2.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2713: na putri racayauṣadhaṃ visṛja romam atyuddhataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:2714: mudhā priya-sakhīṃ prati tvam aśivaṃ kim āśaṅkase /
GR14ruphbr_u:2716: varākṣi harir ity asau vitanute 'dya hikkā-bharam // RBhrs_2,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2726: bhāvaiś cittam ihākrāntaṃ sattvam ity ucyate budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2727: sattvād asmāt samutpannā ye ye bhāvās te tu sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2728: snigdhā digdhās tathā rukṣā ity amī trividhā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2730: snigdhās tu sāttvikā mukhyā gauṇāś ceti dvidhā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2732: ākramān mukhyayā ratyā mukhyāḥ syuḥ sāttvikā amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:2733: vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandhaḥ sākṣād evātra sūribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2739: mukhyaḥ stambho 'yam itthaṃ te jñeyāḥ svedādayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2742: atra kṛṣṇasya sambandhaḥ syāt kiñcid vyavadhānataḥ // RBhrs_2,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2751: jane jāta-ratau digdhās te ced raty-anugāminaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2757: kampo raty-anugāmitvād asau digdha itīryate // RBhrs_2,3.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2760: jātā bhaktopame rukṣā rati-śūnye jane kvacit // RBhrs_2,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2768: mumukṣu-prabhṛtau pūrvaṃ yo ratābhyāsa īritaḥ // RBhrs_2,3.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2769: cittaṃ sattvībhavat prāṇe nyasyaty ātmānam udbhaṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2770: prāṇas tu vikriyāṃ gacchan dehaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2771: tadā stambhādayo bhāvā bhakta-dehe bhavanty amī // RBhrs_2,3.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2773: vaivarṇyam aśru pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2775: kadācit sva-pradhānaḥ san dehe carati sarvataḥ // RBhrs_2,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2779: romāñca-kampa-vaivarṇyāṇy atra trīṇi tanoty asau // RBhrs_2,3.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2780: bahir antaś ca vikṣobha-vidhāyitvād ataḥ sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:2798: tad-dhāmnābhūd ajas tūṣṇīṃ pūr-devy-antīva putrikā // RBhrs_2,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2800: śiśoḥ śyāmasya paśyantī śailam abhraṃlihaṃ kare /
GR14ruphbr_u:2838: kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghri-
GR14ruphbr_u:2844: śrīdāmno yoddhu-kāmasya reme romāñcitaṃ vapuḥ // RBhrs_2,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2852: vaisvaryaṃ svara-bhedaḥ syād eṣa gadgadikādikṛt // RBhrs_2,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2873: tvayy arpitaṃ vitara veṇum iti pramādī
GR14ruphbr_u:2876: patrī mukunda tad anena sa hārito 'sti // RBhrs_2,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2886: cakampe drāg amarṣeṇa bhū-kampe girirāḍ iva // RBhrs_2,3.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2888: vihasasi kathaṃ hatāśe paśya bhayenādya kampamānāsmi /
GR14ruphbr_u:2889: cañcalam upasīdantaṃ nivāraya vraja-pates tanayam // RBhrs_2,3.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2895: gokulaṃ kṛṣṇa devarṣeḥ śvetadvīpa-bhramaṃ dadhe // RBhrs_2,3.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2906: viṣāde śvetimā proktā dhausaryaṃ kālimā kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:2907: roṣe tu raktimā bhītyāṃ kālimā kvāpi śuklimā // RBhrs_2,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2938: nābhyajānan imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva // RBhrs_2,3.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2939: sarve hi sattva-mūlatvād bhāvā yadyapi sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2942: tata eva tāratamyaṃ sarveṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ syāt // RBhrs_2,3.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2944: vṛddhiṃ yathottaraṃ yāntaḥ sāttvikāḥ syuś catur-vidhāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2946: svarūpeṇa tathotkarṣa iti vṛddhis tridhā bhavet // RBhrs_2,3.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2954: prāyo dhūmāyitā eva rukṣās tiṣṭhanti sāttvikāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:2955: snigdhās tu prāyaśaḥ sarve caturdhaiva bhavanty amī // RBhrs_2,3.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2957: jvalanty ullāsinaḥ kvāpi te rukṣā api kasyacit // RBhrs_2,3.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2959: ete hi tad-vinābhāvān na camatkāritāśrayāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2962: īṣad-vyaktā apahnotuṃ śakyā dhūmāyitā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2969: te dvau trayo vā yugapad yāntaḥ suprakaṭāṃ daśām /
GR14ruphbr_u:2970: śakyāḥ kṛcchreṇa nihnotuṃ jvalitā iti kīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,3.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2972: na guñjām ādātuṃ prabhavati karaḥ kampa-taralo
GR14ruphbr_u:2973: dṛśau sāsre piñchaṃ na paricinutaṃ satvara-kṛti /
GR14ruphbr_u:2974: kṣamāv ūrū stabdhau padam api na gantuṃ tava sakhe
GR14ruphbr_u:2975: vanād vaṃśī-dhvāne parisaram avāpte śravaṇayoḥ // RBhrs_2,3.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:2977: niruddhaṃ bāṣpāmbhaḥ katham api mayā gadgada-giro
GR14ruphbr_u:2978: hriyā sadyo gūḍhāḥ sakhi vighaṭito vepathur api /
GR14ruphbr_u:2980: tathāpy ūhāñcakre mama manasi rāgaḥ parijanaiḥ // RBhrs_2,3.75 //

GR14ruphbr_u:2990: kim unmīlaty asre kusumaja-rajo gañjasi mudhā

GR14ruphbr_u:2995: ekadā vyaktim āpannāḥ pañca-ṣāḥ sarva eva vā /

GR14ruphbr_u:2998: adya svidyati vepate pulakibhir nispandatām aṅgakair
GR14ruphbr_u:2999: dhatte kākubhir ākulaṃ vilapati mlāyaty analpoṣmabhiḥ /

GR14ruphbr_u:3023: niśamya vijayaṃ prabhor dadhati bāṣpa-dhārām amī // RBhrs_2,3.88 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3030: prakṛtyā śithilaṃ yeṣāṃ manaḥ picchilam eva vā /

GR14ruphbr_u:3061: ūrmivad vardhayanty enaṃ yānti tad-rūpatāṃ ca te // RBhrs_2,4.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3062: nirvedo 'tha viṣādo dainyaṃ glāni-śramau ca mada-garvau /

GR14ruphbr_u:3090: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ /

GR14ruphbr_u:3148: mā'nayaṃ bhoḥ kṛthās tvāṃ tu nanda-gopa-sutaṃ priyam /

GR14ruphbr_u:3151: ojaḥ somātmakaṃ dehe bala-puṣṭi-kṛd asya tu /

GR14ruphbr_u:3191: viveka-hara ullāso madaḥ sa dvi-vidho mataḥ /

GR14ruphbr_u:3197: pinasmi jagad-aṇḍakaṃ nanu hariḥ krudhaṃ dhāsyati /

GR14ruphbr_u:3202: kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3204: mada-skhalitam ālapan hala-dharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt // RBhrs_2,4.37 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3208: atra nātyupayogitvād vistārya na hi varṇitaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.39 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3221: hastam utkṣipya yāto 'si balāt kṛṣṇa kim adbhutam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3222: hṛdayād yadi niryāsi pauruṣaṃ gaṇayāmi te // RBhrs_2,4.43 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3289: cittasya sambhramo yaḥ syād āvego 'yaṃ sa cāṣṭadhā /

GR14ruphbr_u:3317: dhīr vyagrājani naḥ samasta-suhṛdāṃ tāṃ prāṇa-rakṣā-maṇiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3318: gavyā gauravataḥ samīkṣya niviḍe tiṣṭhantam antar-vane /

GR14ruphbr_u:3440: kṛṣṇa-sphūrti-viśeṣas tu na kadāpy atra līyate // RBhrs_2,4.98 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3501: adhṛṣṭatā bhaved vrīḍā tatra maunaṃ vicintanam /

GR14ruphbr_u:3521: priyā bhūtvā'priyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmi taṃ punaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.117 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3549: prauḍhāpy asyā ratiḥ kṛṣṇe durvitarkā parair abhūt // RBhrs_2,4.125 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3575: na kaṇṭhe yan mālyaṃ kalayasi purastāt kṛtam api /
GR14ruphbr_u:3579: asau kiṃ tāpiñcho na hi tad-amala-śrīr iha gatiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:3580: payodaḥ kiṃ vāmaṃ na yad iha niraṅko himakaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3582: dhruvaṃ mūrdhany adrer vidhu-mukhi mukundo viharati // RBhrs_2,4.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3583: vinirṇayānta evāyaṃ tarka ity ūcire pare // RBhrs_2,4.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3593: tasthur mṛjantya uru-duḥkha-bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm // RBhrs_2,4.137 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3598: kim ahaha gṛhaṃ krīḍā-lubdha tvayādya visasmare // RBhrs_2,4.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3603: tava sutam aham eva drāk parāvartayāmi // RBhrs_2,4.139 //

GR14ruphbr_u:3610: tāṃ tām eva hi devatāṃ paramikāṃ jalpantu kalpāvadhi /
GR14ruphbr_u:3611: siddhānte punar eka eva bhagavān viṣṇuḥ samastāgama-
GR14ruphbr_u:3615: ātmātmadaś ca jagatām iti me vṛto 'si /
GR14ruphbr_u:3625: śayīmahi mahī-pṛṣṭhe kurvīmahi kim īśvaraiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.145 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3633: mano mama catur-vargaṃ tṛṇāyāpi na manyate // RBhrs_2,4.147 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3636: harṣaḥ syād iha romāñcaḥ svedo 'śru mukha-phullatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3645: candanāliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭaromā cucumba ha // RBhrs_2,4.150 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3653: sadyo visṛjya gṛha-karma patīṃś ca talpe
GR14ruphbr_u:3654: draṣṭuṃ yayur yuvatayaḥ sma narendra-mārge // RBhrs_2,4.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3657: druta-gati harim ārāt prāpya kuñje smitākṣī /

GR14ruphbr_u:3671: huta-bhuji bata kuryāṃ jāṭhare vauṣaḍ enaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3672: sapadi danuja-hantuḥ kintu roṣād bibhemi // RBhrs_2,4.156 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3675: na hi danuja-ripor yaḥ prauṅdha-kīrter visoḍhum /

GR14ruphbr_u:3681: hahā bata viḍambanā śiva śivādya naḥ śṛṇvatāṃ

GR14ruphbr_u:3690: kalyāṇī me nivasati vadhūḥ paśya pārśve navoḍhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3692: niḥśaṅkas tvaṃ bhramasi bhavitā nākulatvaṃ kuto me // RBhrs_2,4.161 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3695: jane bhavati mad-vidhe paribhavo hi nātaḥ paraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3697: varāpi yad ayogyayā sphuṭam adūṣi tārākhyayā // RBhrs_2,4.162 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3703: kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi // RBhrs_2,4.163 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3710: {*Attributed to Dāmodara in Padyāvalī. Also found in Amaru 55;
GR14ruphbr_u:3713: SāhD 3.105 (as an example of mada); Daśa 2.22.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:3716: anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanam īdṛśīnāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3717: vairī na ced bhavati vepathur antarāyaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3719: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat /
GR14ruphbr_u:3722: svayaṃ parājayaṃ prāptān kṛṣṇa-pakṣān vijitya naḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3723: baliṣṭhā bala-pakṣāś ced durbalāḥ ke tataḥ kṣitau // RBhrs_2,4.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3735: guror api puro nīvīṃ yā bhraṃśayati subhruvām // RBhrs_2,4.170 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3749: sukham avicalad-aṅgāḥ śerate paśya gopāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.174 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3752: vakṣasi nikṣiptāṅgī harer viśākhā yayau nidrām // RBhrs_2,4.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3754: hṛn-mīlanāt puro 'vasthā nidrā bhakteṣu kathyate // RBhrs_2,4.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3760: darpaḥ sarpa-pates tad asya tarasā nirdhūyatām uddhūraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3761: ity utsvapna-girā cirād yadu-sabhāṃ vismāpayan smerayan
GR14ruphbr_u:3762: niḥśvāsena darottaraṅgad-udaraṃ nidrāṃ gato lāṅgalī // RBhrs_2,4.178 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3790: drutaṃ mūrcchām antaḥ sakhi sukha-mayīṃ pallavayati // RBhrs_2,4.185 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3800: iyaṃ te hāsa-śrīr viramatu vimuñcāñcalam idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3802: iti svapne jalpanty aciram avabuddhā gurum asau
GR14ruphbr_u:3803: puro dṛṣṭvā gaurī namita-mukha-bimbā muhur abhūt // RBhrs_2,4.188 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3805: dūtī cāgāt tad-āgāraṃ jajāgāra ca rādhikā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3806: tūrṇaṃ puṇyavatīnāṃ hi tanoti phalam udyamaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.189 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3813: klaibyaṃ kṣamā ca kutukam utkaṇṭhā vinayo 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.192 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3814: saṃśayo dhārṣṭyam ity ādyā bhāvā ye syuḥ pare 'pi ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:3815: ukteṣv antarbhavantīti na pṛthaktvena darśitāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.193 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3817: asūyāyāṃ tu mātsaryaṃ trāse 'py udvega eva tu /
GR14ruphbr_u:3819: viveko nirṇayaś cemau dainye klaibyaṃ kṣamā dhṛtau // RBhrs_2,4.194 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3821: saṃśayo 'ntarbhavet tarke tathā dhārṣṭyaṃ ca cāpale // RBhrs_2,4.195 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3823: vibhāvaś cānubhāvaś ca bhaved eva parasparam // RBhrs_2,4.196 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3824: nirvede tu yatherṣyāyā bhaved atra vibhāvatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:3825: asūyāyāṃ punas tasyā vyaktam uktānubhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.197 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3827: nidrāṃ prati vibhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyaḥ pare 'py amī // RBhrs_2,4.198 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3828: eṣāṃ ca sāttvikānāṃ ca tathā nānā-kriyā-tateḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3829: kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvas tu jñeyaḥ prāyeṇa lokataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.199 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3833: augryaṃ pratyanubhāvatvam evaṃ jñeyāḥ pare 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.201 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3835: sañcāriṇām iha kvāpi bhaved raty-anubhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.202 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3836: sākṣād-rater na sambandhaḥ ṣaḍbhis trāsādibhiḥ saha /
GR14ruphbr_u:3840: paratantrāḥ svatantrāś cety uktāḥ sañcāriṇo dvidhā // RBhrs_2,4.205 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3842: varāvaratayā proktāḥ paratantrā api dvidhā // RBhrs_2,4.206 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3844: sākṣād vyavahitaś ceti varo 'py eṣa dvidhoditaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.207 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3846: mukhyām eva ratiṃ puṣṇan sākṣād ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_2,4.208 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3851: vyarthena kiṃ hanta dṛśor dvayena // RBhrs_2,4.209 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3853: puṣṇāti yo ratiṃ gauṇīṃ sa vyavahito mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.210 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3855: dhig astu me bhuja-dvandvaṃ bhīmasya parighopamam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3856: mādhavākṣepiṇaṃ duṣṭaṃ yat pinaṣṭi na cedipam // RBhrs_2,4.211 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3857: nirvedaḥ krodha-vaśyatvād ayaṃ vyavahito rateḥ // RBhrs_2,4.212 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3859: rasa-dvayasyāpy aṅgatvam agacchann avaro mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.213 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3864: na svaṃ viśuṣyan smarati sma jiṣṇuḥ // RBhrs_2,4.214 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3866: durvarāvirabhūd bhītir moho 'yaṃ bhī-vaśas tataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.215 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3871: rati-gandhiś ca te tredhā svatantrāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.217 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3873: janeṣu rati-śūnyeṣu rati-śūnyo bhaved asau // RBhrs_2,4.218 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3875: dhig janma nas trivṛd-vidyāṃ dhig vrataṃ dhig bahujñatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:3876: dhik kulaṃ dhik kriyā-dīkṣāṃ vimukhā ye tv adhokṣaje // RBhrs_2,4.219 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3880: paścād ratiṃ spṛśed eṣa raty-anusparśano mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.220 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3883: hā kṛṣṇa pāhi pāhīti cukrośābhīra-bālikā // RBhrs_2,4.221 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3886: yaḥ svātantrye 'pi tad-gandhaṃ rati-gandhir vyanakti saḥ // RBhrs_2,4.222 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3889: saṅgopanāya na hi naptri vidhehi yatnam /
GR14ruphbr_u:3893: ābhāsaḥ punar eteṣām asthāne vṛttito bhavet /
GR14ruphbr_u:3896: vipakṣe vṛttir eteṣāṃ prātikūlyam itīryate // RBhrs_2,4.225 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3911: aprāṇini bhaved ādyaḥ tiryag-ādiṣu cāntimam // RBhrs_2,4.228 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3913: chāyā na yasya sakṛd apy upasevitābhūt
GR14ruphbr_u:3914: kṛṣṇena hanta mama tasya dhig astu janma /
GR14ruphbr_u:3915: mā tvaṃ kadamba vidhuro bhava kāliyāhiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3916: mṛdnan kariṣyati hariś caritārthatāṃ te // RBhrs_2,4.229 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3919: adhirohatu kaḥ pakṣī kakṣām aparo mamādya medhyasya /
GR14ruphbr_u:3920: hitvāpi tārkṣya-paksaṃ bhajate pakṣaṃ harir yasya // RBhrs_2,4.230 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3925: daśāś catasra etāsām utpattis tv iha sambhavaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.232 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3934: uṣasi sakhi tavālī mekhalā paśya bhāti /
GR14ruphbr_u:3936: dṛśam anṛju kirantī rādhikā vaḥ punātu // RBhrs_2,4.234 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3939: sarūpayor bhinnayor vā sandhiḥ syād bhāvayor yutiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.235 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3941: sandhiḥ sarūpayos tatra bhinna-hetūtthayor mataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.236 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3951: durvāracāpalo 'yaṃ dhāvann antar bahiś ca goṣṭhasya /
GR14ruphbr_u:3952: śiśur akutaścid bhītir dhinoti hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me // RBhrs_2,4.239 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3958: himam uṣṇaṃ ca jalaṃ dṛśor dadhe // RBhrs_2,4.240 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3961: bahūnām api bhāvānāṃ sandhiḥ sphuṭam avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,4.241 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3966: dṛśaṃ nyasyanty asmin jayati vṛṣabhānoḥ kula-maṇiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.242 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3971: harim api dara-dūre svāminaṃ tatra cāsīn
GR14ruphbr_u:3975: śavalatvaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ saṃmardaḥ syāt parasparam // RBhrs_2,4.244 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3977: śaktaḥ kiṃ nāma kartuṃ sa śiśur ahaha me mitra-pakṣānadhākṣīd
GR14ruphbr_u:3978: ātiṣṭheyaṃ tam eva drutam atha śaraṇaṃ kuryur etan na vīrāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3979: āṃ divyā malla-goṣṭhī viharati sa kareṇoddadhārādri-varyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:3980: kuryām adyaiva gatvā vraja-bhuvi kadanaṃ hā tataḥ kampate dhīḥ // RBhrs_2,4.245 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3983: dhig dīrghe nayane mamāstu mathurā yābhyāṃ na sā prekṣyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3984: vidyeyaṃ mama kiṅkarī-kṛta-nṛpā kālas tu sarvaṅkaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:3985: lakṣmī-keli-gṛhaṃ gṛhaṃ mama hahā nityaṃ tanuḥ kṣīyate
GR14ruphbr_u:3986: sadmany eva hariṃ bhajeya hṛdayaṃ vṛndāṭavī karṣati // RBhrs_2,4.246 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3989: atyārūḍhasya bhāvasya vilayaḥ śāntir ucyate // RBhrs_2,4.247 //
GR14ruphbr_u:3998: trayastriṃśad ime 'ṣṭau ca vakṣyante sthāyinaś ca ye /
GR14ruphbr_u:3999: mukhya-bhāvābhidhās tv eka-catvāriṃśad amī smṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.250 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4002: kvacit svābhāviko bhāvaḥ kaścid āgantukaḥ kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:4003: yas tu svābhāviko bhāvaḥ sa vyāpyāntar-bahiḥ-sthitaḥ // RBhrs_2,4.252 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4004: mañjiṣṭhādye yathā dravye rāgas tan-maya īkṣyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4005: atra syān nāma-mātreṇa vibhāvasya vibhāvatā // RBhrs_2,4.253 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4007: eka-rūpāpi yā bhakter vividhā pratibhāty asau // RBhrs_2,4.254 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4008: āgantukas tu yo bhāvaḥ paṭādau raktimeva saḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4009: tais tair vibhāvair evāyaṃ dhīyate dīpyate 'pi ca // RBhrs_2,4.255 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4012: vividhānāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyād vividhaṃ manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4015: samyag-unmīlitāś cāmī na lakṣyante sphuṭaṃ janaiḥ // RBhrs_2,4.258 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4017: manāg-unmīlitāś cāmī lakṣyante bahir ulbaṇāḥ // RBhrs_2,4.259 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4022: pattanābhaṃ mahiṣṭhaṃ syāt kṣodiṣṭhaṃ tu kuṭiravat /
GR14ruphbr_u:4024: karkaśaṃ trividhaṃ proktaṃ vajraṃ svarṇaṃ tathā jatu /
GR14ruphbr_u:4027: īdṛśaṃ tāpasādīnāṃ cittaṃ tāvad avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,4.264 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4029: jatu dravatvam āyāti tāpa-leśena sarvataḥ // RBhrs_2,4.265 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4031: amṛtaṃ ceti bhāvo 'tra prāyaḥ sūryātapāyate // RBhrs_2,4.266 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4034: govinda-preṣṭha-varyāṇāṃ cittaṃ syād amṛtaṃ kila // RBhrs_2,4.267 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4036: samavetaṃ sadāmībhir dvitrair api mano bhavet // RBhrs_2,4.268 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4037: kintu suṣṭhu mahiṣṭhatvaṃ bhāvo bāḍham upāgataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4038: sarva-prakāram evedaṃ cittaṃ vikṣobhayaty alam // RBhrs_2,4.269 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4041: ahāryāṃ maryādāṃ dadhad api harer āspadam api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4042: satāṃ stomaḥ premaṇy udayati samagre sthagayituṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4043: vikāraṃ na sphāraṃ jala-nidhir ivendau prabhavati // RBhrs_2,4.270 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4049: aviruddhān viruddhāṃś ca bhāvān yo vaśatāṃ nayan /
GR14ruphbr_u:4050: su-rājeva virājeta sa sthāyī bhāva ucyate // RBhrs_2,5.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4051: sthāyī bhāvo 'tra sa proktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-viṣayā ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4052: mukhyā gauṇī ca sā dvedhā rasa-jñaiḥ parikīrtitā // RBhrs_2,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4055: mukhyāpi dvi-vidhā svārthā parārthā ceti kīrtyate // RBhrs_2,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4057: aviruddhaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāvaiḥ puṣṇāty ātmānam eva yā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4058: viruddhair duḥkha-glāniḥ sā svārthā kathitā ratiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4060: aviruddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca saṅkucantī svayaṃ ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4061: yā bhāvam anugṛhṇāti sā parārthā nigadyate // RBhrs_2,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4062: śuddhā prītis tathā sakhyaṃ vātsalyaṃ priyatety asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4063: svaparārthyaiva sā mukhyā punaḥ pañca-vidhā bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4067: sāmānyāsau tathā svacchā śāntiś cety ādimā tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4071: bālikadaiś ca kṛṣṇe syāt sāmānyā sā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4073: asmin mathurā-vīthyām udayati madhure virocane purataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4074: kathasva sakhe mradimānaṃ mānasa-madanaṃ kim eti mama // RBhrs_2,5.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4077: yā puraḥ kṛṣṇam ālokya huṅkurvaty abhidhāvati // RBhrs_2,5.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4080: sādhākānāṃ tu vaividhyaṃ yāntī svacchā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4081: yadā yādṛśī bhakte syād āsaktis tādṛśaṃ tadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4082: rūpaṃ sphaṭikavad dhatte svacchāsau tena kīrtitā // RBhrs_2,5.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4084: kvacit prabhur iti stuvan kvacana mitram ity uddhasan
GR14ruphbr_u:4085: kvacit tanaya ity avan kvacana kānta ity ullasan /
GR14ruphbr_u:4086: kvacin manasi bhāvayan parama eṣa ātmety asāv
GR14ruphbr_u:4087: abhūd vividha-sevayā vividha-vṛttir āryo dvijaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4089: āryāṇām atiśuddhānāṃ prāyaḥ svacchā ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4091: mānase nirvikalpatvaṃ śama ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_2,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4094: ātmanaḥ kathyate so 'tra svabhāvaḥ śama ity asau // RBhrs_2,5.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4096: paramātmatayā kṛṣṇe jātā śānta-ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4099: sanakasya tanau kampo brahmānubhavino 'py abhūt // RBhrs_2,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4104: paramaṃ brahma didṛkṣate mano me // RBhrs_2,5.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4106: rater asyā asamparkād iyaṃ śuddheti bhaṇyate // RBhrs_2,5.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4107: atha bheda-trayī hṛdyā rateḥ prīty-ādir īryate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4110: tri-vidheṣu trayī prītiḥ sakhyaṃ vatsalatety asau // RBhrs_2,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4112: kevalā saṅkulā ceti dvi-vidheyaṃ rati-trayī // RBhrs_2,5.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4116: gurau ca vrajanāthādau krameṇaiva sphuraty asau // RBhrs_2,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4118: eṣāṃ dvayos trayāṇāṃ vā sannipātas tu saṅkulā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4119: udbhavādau ca bhīmādau mathurādau krameṇa sā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4120: yasyādhikyaṃ bhaved yatra sa tena vyapadiśyate // RBhrs_2,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4122: svasmād bhavanti ye nyūnās te 'nugrāhyā harer matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4123: ārādhyatvātmikā teṣāṃ ratiḥ prītir itīritā // RBhrs_2,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4124: tatrāsakti-kṛd anyatra prīti-saṃhāriṇī hy asau // RBhrs_2,5.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4126: divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso
GR14ruphbr_u:4131: ye syus tulyā mukundasya te sakhāyaḥ satāṃ matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4142: sadyas tvayā tad api kathanam eva kṛtvā
GR14ruphbr_u:4143: devyai hriye trayam adāyi jvalāñjalīnām // RBhrs_2,5.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4145: guravo ye harer asya te pūjyā iti viśrutāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4151: gās tatra rakṣitum asau gahane mṛdur me
GR14ruphbr_u:4152: bālaḥ prayāty avirataṃ bata kiṃ karomi // RBhrs_2,5.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4165: ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit // RBhrs_2,5.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4168: saṅkucantyā svayaṃ ratyā sa gauṇī ratir ucyate // RBhrs_2,5.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4169: hāso vismaya utsāhaḥ śokaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4170: jugupsā cety asau bhāva-viśeṣaḥ saptadhoditaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4172: syād dehādi-vibhāvatvaṃ saptamyās tu rater vaśāt // RBhrs_2,5.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4174: parārthāyā rater yogād rati-śabdaḥ prayujyate // RBhrs_2,5.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4175: hāsottarā ratir yā syāt sā hāsa-ratir ucyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4176: evaṃ vismaya-raty-ādyā vijñeyā ratayaś ca ṣaṭ // RBhrs_2,5.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4177: kañcit kālaṃ kvacid bhakte hāsādyāḥ sthāyitām amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:4180: sahajā api līyante baliṣṭhena tiraskṛtāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4183: syur etasyā vinā-bhāvād bhāvāḥ sarve nirarthakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4187: nirvedādyā vilīyante nārhanti sthāyitāṃ tataḥ // RBhrs_2,5.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4188: ity ato mati-garvādi-bhāvānāṃ ghaṭate na hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4189: sthāyitā kaiścid iṣṭāpi pramāṇaṃ tatra tad-vidaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4190: sapta hāsādayas tv ete tais tair nītāḥ supuṣṭatām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4191: bhakteṣu sthāyitāṃ yānto rucir ebhyo vitanvate // RBhrs_2,5.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4201: mayā dṛg api nārpitā sumukhi dadhni tubhyaṃ śape
GR14ruphbr_u:4202: sakhī tava nirargalā tad api me mukhaṃ jighrati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4203: praśādhi tad imāṃ mudhā cchalita-sādhum ity acyute
GR14ruphbr_u:4204: vadaty ajani dūtikā hasita-rodhane na kṣamā // RBhrs_2,5.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4208: pūrvokta-rītyā niṣpannaḥ sa vismaya-ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4213: para-brahmollāsān vahati kim idaṃ hanta kim idam // RBhrs_2,5.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4216: satvarā mānasāsaktir utsāha iti kīrtyate // RBhrs_2,5.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4218: siddhaḥ pūrvokta-vidhinā sa utsāha ratir bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4256: niṣpannaṃ pūrvavad idaṃ budhā bhaya-ratiṃ viduḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4257: eṣāpi krodha-rativad dvi-vidhā kathitā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4271: rater anugrahāj jātā sā jugupsā-ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4278: ity aṣṭau sthāyino yāvad rasāvasthāṃ na saṃśritāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4280: ihāṣṭau sāttvikāś caite bhāvākhyās tān asaṅkhyakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4286: prāyaḥ sukha-mayāḥ śītā uṣṇā duḥkha-mayā iha /
GR14ruphbr_u:4287: citreyaṃ paramānanda-sāndrāpy uṣṇā ratir matā // RBhrs_2,5.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4288: śītair bhāvair baliṣṭhais tu puṣṭā śītāyate hy asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4289: uṣṇais tu ratir atyuṣṇā tāpayantīva bhāsate // RBhrs_2,5.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4290: ratir dvidhāpi kṛṣṇādyaiḥ śrutair avagataiḥ smṛtaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4291: tair vibhāvāditāṃ yadbhis tad-bhakteṣu raso bhavet // RBhrs_2,5.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4300: gacchanto rasa-rūpatvaṃ militā yānty akhaṇḍatām // RBhrs_2,5.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4302: udbhāsaḥ kasyacit kvāpi vibhāvādes tathā rase // RBhrs_2,5.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4304: stambhādyāḥ kāra-bhūtāś ca nirvedādyāḥ sahāyakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4308: vibhāvayanti kurvantīty uktā dhīrair vibhāvakāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4310: ity uktā anubhāvās te kaṭākṣādyāḥ sa-sāttvikāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.88 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4312: ye nirvedādayo bhāvās te tu sañcāriṇo matāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.89 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4314: sevām āhuḥ paraṃ hetuṃ kecit tat-pakṣa-rāgiṇaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4316: rater asyāḥ prabhāvo 'yaṃ bhavet kāraṇam uttamam // RBhrs_2,5.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4318: raty-ākhyā ity ayaṃ yukto na hi tarkeṇa bādhitum /
GR14ruphbr_u:4319: bhāratādy-uktir eṣā hi prāktanair apy udāhṛtā // RBhrs_2,5.92 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4321: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa yojayet
GR14ruphbr_u:4322: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yac ca tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam // RBhrs_2,5.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4324: etair eva tathābhūtaiḥ svaṃ saṃvardhayati sphuṭam // RBhrs_2,5.94 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4325: yathā svair eva salilaiḥ paripūrya balāhakān /
GR14ruphbr_u:4326: ratnālayo bhavaty ebhir vṛṣṭais tair eva vāridhiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4330: rater eva prabhāvo 'yaṃ hetus teṣāṃ tathākṛtau // RBhrs_2,5.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4332: tathānubhūyamānās te vistīrṇāṃ kurvate ratim // RBhrs_2,5.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4334: atra sāhāyikaṃ vyaktaṃ mitho 'jasram avekṣyate // RBhrs_2,5.99 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4335: kintv etasyāḥ prabhāvo 'pi vairūpye sati kuñcati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4336: vairūpyas tu vibhāvāder anaucityam udīryate // RBhrs_2,5.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4338: yatra sādhāraṇatayā bhāvāḥ sādhu sphuranty amī // RBhrs_2,5.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4340: sādhāraṇyaṃ tad evoktaṃ bhāvānāṃ pūrva-sūribhiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4343: pramātā tad-abhedena svaṃ yayā pratipadyate // RBhrs_2,5.103 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:4344: duḥkhādayaḥ sphuranto 'pi jātu bhāntaḥ svīyatayā hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4352: rasaḥ syān neti nāṭya-jñā yad āhur yuktam eva tat // RBhrs_2,5.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4354: yoge rasa-viśeṣatvaṃ gacchanty eva hari-priye // RBhrs_2,5.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4363: rasasya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati // RBhrs_2,5.112 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4364: pūrvam uktād dvidhā bhdedān mukhya-gauṇatayā rateḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4365: bhaved bhakti-raso 'py eṣa mukhya-gauṇatayā dvidhā // RBhrs_2,5.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4366: pañcadhāpi rater aikyān mukhyas tv eka ihoditaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4367: saptadhātra tathā gauṇa iti bhakti-raso 'ṣṭadhā // RBhrs_2,5.114 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4369: mukhyas tu pañcadhā śāntaḥ prītaḥ preyāṃś ca vatsalaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4370: madhuraś cety amī jñeyā yathā-pūrvam anuttamāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.115 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4372: hāsyo 'dbhutas tathā vīraḥ karuṇo raudra ity api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4373: bhayānakaḥ sa bībhatsa iti gauṇaś ca saptadhā // RBhrs_2,5.116 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4375: vastutas tu purāṇādau pañcadhaiva vilokyate // RBhrs_2,5.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4377: gauro dhūmras tathā raktaḥ kālo nītaḥ kramād amī // RBhrs_2,5.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4379: balaḥ kūrmas tathā kalkī rāghavo bhārgavaḥ kiriḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4380: mīna ity eṣu kathitāḥ kramād dvādaśa devatāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4383: pūrtiḥ śānte vikāśas tu prītādiṣv api pañcasu /
GR14ruphbr_u:4385: bhayānake 'tha bībhatse kṣobho dhīrair udāhṛtaḥ // RBhrs_2,5.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4388: pratīyamānā apy ajñair grāmyaiḥ sapadi duḥkhavat /
GR14ruphbr_u:4389: karuṇādyā rasāḥ prājñaiḥ prauḍhānanda-mayā matāḥ // RBhrs_2,5.123 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4391: sad-uktyā ca sukhaṃ tebhyaḥ syāt suvyaktam iti sthitiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4393: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yat paraṃ sukham /
GR14ruphbr_u:4394: sucetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam // RBhrs_2,5.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4398: prītyā rāmāyaṇaṃ nityaṃ hanumān śṛṇuyāt katham // RBhrs_2,5.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4400: sañcārī syāt samāno vā kṛṣṇa-ratyāḥ suhṛd-ratiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4401: adhikā puṣyamāṇā ced bhāvollāsā ratiḥ // RBhrs_2,5.128 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4404: ity eṣa bhakti-rasikaś caurād iva mahā-nidhiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4409: hṛdi sattvojjvale bāḍhaṃ svadate sa raso mataḥ // RBhrs_2,5.132 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4411: bhāvyate gāḍha-saṃskāraiś citte bhāvaḥ sa kathyate // RBhrs_2,5.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4427: sa mayi sanātana-mūrtis tanotu puruṣottamas tuṣṭim // RBhrs_3,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4429: mukhyo bhakti-rasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāntādīr īryate // RBhrs_3,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4431: athāmī pañca lakṣyante rasāḥ śāntādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_3,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4434: sthāyī śānti-ratir dhīraiḥ śānta-bhakti-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4435: prāyaḥ sva-sukha-jātīyaṃ sukhaṃ syād atra yoginām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4436: kintv ātma-saukhyam aghanaṃ ghanaṃ tv īśam ayaṃ sukham // RBhrs_3,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4440: caturbhujaś ca śāntāś ca asminn ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4447: paramātmā paraṃ brahma śamo dāntaḥ śucir vaśī // RBhrs_3,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4449: vibhur ity ādi guṇavān asminn ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4455: prādhānyāt sanakādīnāṃ rūpaṃ bhaktiś ca kathyate // RBhrs_3,1.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4461: gate kim api vastuni svayam adīpi tāvat sukham /
GR14ruphbr_u:4463: mukunda sukha-cid-ghanā tava babhūva sākṣāt-kṛtiḥ // RBhrs_3,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4466: anujjhita-mumukṣā ye bhajante te tu tāpasāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4470: hṛdi dhyāyaṃ dhyāyaṃ muhur iha mukundābhidham ahaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4471: cidānandaṃ jyotiḥ kṣaṇam iva vineṣyāmi rajanīḥ // RBhrs_3,1.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4479: eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ proktā budhair uddīpanā amī // RBhrs_3,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4488: ityādy uddīpanā sādhāraṇās teṣāṃ kilāśritaiḥ // RBhrs_3,1.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4498: harer dviṣy api na dveṣo nātibhaktiḥ priyeṣv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:4499: siddhatāyās tathā jīvan-mukteś ca bahu-mānitā // RBhrs_3,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4501: maunam ity ādayaḥ śītāḥ syur asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4508: stavādayaś ca dāsādyaiḥ śītāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,1.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4522: sāttvikās tu jvalanty eva na tu dīptā bhavanty amī // RBhrs_3,1.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4524: sañcārino 'tra nirvedo dhṛtir harṣo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4530: vṛthā gato bata ciraṃ kālaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4532: atra śānti-ratiḥ sthāyī samā sāndrā ca sā dvidhā // RBhrs_3,1.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4535: līlayā mayi labdhe 'sya babhūvotkampinī tanuḥ // RBhrs_3,1.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4546: vilocana-camatkṛtiṃ kathaya kiṃ nu nirmāsyati // RBhrs_3,1.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4551: na pratyag-ātmani mano ramate pureva // RBhrs_3,1.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4559: mūrdhnā ruddha-dṛg-aśrubhiḥ pulakito drāg eṣa līna-vrataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4560: akṣṇor aṅganam añjana-tviṣi para-brahmaṇy avāpte mudā
GR14ruphbr_u:4561: mudrābhiḥ prakaṭīkaroty avamatiṃ yogī svarūpa-sthitau // RBhrs_3,1.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4563: prathamaṃ jñāna-niṣṭho 'pi so 'traiva ratim udvahet // RBhrs_3,1.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4570: eṣa bhakti-rasānanda-nipuṇaḥ syād yathā śukaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4572: śānty-ākhyāyā rater atra svīkārān na virudhyate // RBhrs_3,1.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4574: tan-niṣṭhā durghaṭā buddher etāṃ śānta-ratiṃ vinā // RBhrs_3,1.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4578: nāsti yatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na dveṣo na ca matsaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4579: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ // RBhrs_3,1.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4583: śāntam eva rasaṃ pūrve prāhur ekam anekadhā // RBhrs_3,1.50 //
