GR14ruphbr_u:4584: nirvedo viṣaye sthāyi tattva-jñānodbhavaḥ sa cet /
GR14ruphbr_u:4596: śāntatvenāyam evāddhā sudevādyaiś ca varṇitaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4598: nītā cetasi bhaktānāṃ prīti-bhakti-raso mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4599: anugrāhyasya dāsatvāl lālyatvād apy ayaṃ dvidhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4600: bhidyate sambhrama-prīto gaurava-prīta ity api // RBhrs_3,2.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4604: hariś ca tasya dāsāś ca jñeyā ālambanā iha // RBhrs_3,2.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4607: anyatra dvi-bhujaḥ kvāpi kutrāpy eṣu catur-bhujaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4612: prabhur divi divaukaso bhuvi dhinoti naḥ kiṅkarān // RBhrs_3,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4621: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaś caturbhir bhujaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4623: māṃ vyasmārayad eṣa kaṃsa-vijayī vaikuṇṭha-goṣṭhī-śriyam // RBhrs_3,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4631: vadānyas tejasā yuktaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kīrti-saṃśrayaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4632: varīyān balavān prema-vaśya ity ādibhir guṇaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4633: yutaś catur-vidheṣv eṣa dāseṣv ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,2.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4645: rūpaṃ prasiddham evaiṣāṃ tena bhaktir udīryate // RBhrs_3,2.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4647: kā paryety ambikeyaṃ harim avakalayan kampate kaḥ śiro 'sau
GR14ruphbr_u:4648: taṃ kaḥ stauty eṣa dhātā praṇamati viluṭhan kaḥ kṣitau vāsavo 'yam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4649: kaḥ stabdho hasyate 'ddhā danujabhid-anujaiḥ pūrvajo 'yaṃ mametthaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4650: kālindī jāmbavatyāṃ tridaśa-paricayaṃ jāla-randhrād vyatānīt // RBhrs_3,2.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4652: te śaraṇyā jñāni-carāḥ sevā-niṣṭhās tridhāśritāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4654: kecid bhītāḥ śaraṇam abhitaḥ saṃśrayante bhavantaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4656: śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ tava nava-navāṃ mādhurīṃ sādhu-vṛndād
GR14ruphbr_u:4657: vṛndāraṇyotsava kila vayaṃ deva sevemahi tvām // RBhrs_3,2.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4666: kāmādīnāṃ kati na katidhā pālitā durnideśās
GR14ruphbr_u:4667: teṣāṃ jātā mayi na karuṇā na trapā nopaśāntiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4669: tvām āyātaḥ śaraṇam abhayaṃ māṃ niyuṅkṣvātma-dāsye // RBhrs_3,2.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4671: ye mumukṣāṃ parityajya harim eva samāśritāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4672: śaunaka-pramukhās te tu proktā jñāni-carāḥ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4677: kṛtādya no yena kṛśā mumukṣā // RBhrs_3,2.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4679: dhyānātītaṃ kim api paramaṃ ye tu jānanti tattvaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4686: ikṣvākuḥ śrutadevāś ca puṇḍarīkādayaś ca te // RBhrs_3,2.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4689: śūnyodyāne nayati vihagān apy alaṃ bhikṣu-caryām /
GR14ruphbr_u:4690: ity utkarṣaṃ kam api sa-camatkāram ākarṇya citraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4691: sevāyāṃ te sphuṭam aghahara śraddhayā gardhito 'smi // RBhrs_3,2.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4693: uddhavo dāruko jaitraḥ śrutadevaś ca śatrujit /
GR14ruphbr_u:4696: tathāpi kvāpy avasare paricaryāṃ ca kurvate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4707: dvāri dvāravatī-purasya purataḥ sevotsukas tiṣṭhati // RBhrs_3,2.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4708: eteṣāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān uddhavaḥ prema-viklavaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4713: mukhyaṃ pāriṣadeṣu bhakti-laharī-ruddhaṃ bhajāmy uddhavam // RBhrs_3,2.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4717: mantraṃ pṛcchati mām apeśala-dhiyaṃ vijñāna-vārāṃ nidhir
GR14ruphbr_u:4718: vikrīḍaty asakṛd vicitra-caritaḥ so 'yaṃ prabhur mādṛśām // RBhrs_3,2.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4721: purasthāś ca vrajasthāś cety ucyate anugā dvidhā // RBhrs_3,2.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4733: ānandaś candrahāsaś ca payodo vakulas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4734: rasadaḥ śāradādyāś ca vrajasthā anugā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4742: varair agurubhir jalaṃ racaya vāsitaṃ vārida /
GR14ruphbr_u:4744: parāga-paṭalī gavāṃ diśam arundha paurandarīm // RBhrs_3,2.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4745: vrajānugeṣu sarveṣu varīyān raktako mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4756: dhūryo dhīraś ca vīraś ca tridhā pāriṣad-ādikaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4759: yaḥ prītiṃ tanute bhaktaḥ sa dhūrya iha kīrtyate // RBhrs_3,2.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4761: devaḥ sevyatayā yathā sphurati me devyas tathāsya priyāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:4763: smṛtvā sāhasikaṃ bibhemi tam ahaṃ bhaktābhimānonnataṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4764: prītiṃ tat-praṇate khare 'py avidadhad yaḥ svāsthyam ālambate // RBhrs_3,2.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4767: tasya prasāda-pātraṃ syān mukhyaṃ dhīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4774: kṛpāṃ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṃ nānyam apekṣate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4775: atulāṃ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṃ vīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4777: pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
GR14ruphbr_u:4778: kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4780: priyā pariṣad-agrimāṃ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api // RBhrs_3,2.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4785: sva eva dhiṣṇye 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā // RBhrs_3,2.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4787: nitya-siddhāś ca siddhāś ca sādhakāḥ parikīrtitaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4791: ity ādayo vibhāvāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4793: kṛṣṇasya paśyata kṛpāṃ kṛpādyāḥ kṛpaṇe mayi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4794: dhyeyo 'sau nidhane hanta dṛśor adhvānam abhyagāt // RBhrs_3,2.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4797: tad-aṅga-saurabhādyās tu sarvaiḥ sādhāraṇā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4802: citraṃ vāri-dharān vināpi tarasā yair adya dhārā-mayair
GR14ruphbr_u:4803: dūrāt paśyata deva-mātṛkam abhūd vṛndāṭavī-maṇḍalam // RBhrs_3,2.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4807: tan-niṣṭhādyāḥ śītāḥ syur eṣv asādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4814: virāgādyāś ca ye śītāḥ proktāḥ sādhāraṇās tu te // RBhrs_3,2.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4818: natvā munīṃś ca saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha // RBhrs_3,2.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4825: stambhādyāḥ sāttvikāḥ sarve prītādi-tritaye matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4838: dainyaṃ cintā smṛtiḥ śaṅkā matir autsukya-cāpale // RBhrs_3,2.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4840: bodhaḥ svapnaḥ klamo vyādhir mṛtiś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4842: yoge trayaḥ syur dhṛty-antā ayoge tu klamādayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4843: ubhayatra pare śeṣā nirvedādyāḥ satāṃ matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4855: ādhis tad-virahe deva grīṣme sara ivāṃśumān // RBhrs_3,2.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4857: dhanyāḥ sphurati tava sūrya karāḥ sahasraṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4860: dūre muhūrtam api yā na vilokate tam // RBhrs_3,2.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4864: eṣā rase 'tra kathitā sthāyi-bhāvatayā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4866: tatra pāriṣadādes tu hetuḥ saṃskāra eva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:4869: vṛddhiṃ premā tataḥ snehas tato rāga iti tridhā // RBhrs_3,2.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4872: mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4876: kadā namaskariṣāmi gopa-rūpaṃ tam īśvaram // RBhrs_3,2.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4882: naya māṃ vikṛtir na hi me tvat-pada-kamalāvalambasya // RBhrs_3,2.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4887: arajyata sa mayy aho dviguṇam eva vairocaniḥ // RBhrs_3,2.83 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4889: sāndraś citta-dravaṃ kurvan premā sneha itīryate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4890: kṣaṇikasyāpi neha syād visleṣasya sahiṣṇutā // RBhrs_3,2.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4895: citrā na te dāruka dāru-kalpatā // RBhrs_3,2.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4897: patnīṃ ratna-nidheḥ parām upaharan pūreṇa bāṣpāmbhasāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4900: stabdho 'py abhyadhikāṃ śriyaṃ praṇamatāṃ vṛndād dadhāroddhavaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.86 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4902: snehaḥ sa rāgo yena syāt sukhaṃ duḥkham api sphuṭam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4903: tat-sambandha-lave 'py atra prītiḥ prāṇa-vyayair api // RBhrs_3,2.87 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4905: gurur api bhujagād bhīs takṣakāt prājya-rājya-
GR14ruphbr_u:4906: cyutir atiśayinī ca prāya-caryā ca gurvī /
GR14ruphbr_u:4914: prāya ādya-dvaye premā snehaḥ pāriṣadeṣv asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:4915: parīkṣiti bhaved-rāgo dāruke ca tathoddhave // RBhrs_3,2.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4917: asminn abhyudite bhāvaḥ prāyaḥ syāt sakhya-leśa-bhāk // RBhrs_3,2.91 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4921: ayoga-yogāv etasya prabhedau kathitāv ubhau // RBhrs_3,2.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4923: saṅgābhāvo harer dhīrair ayoga iti kathyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:4926: utkaṇṭhitaṃ viyogaś cety ayoge 'pi dvidhocyate // RBhrs_3,2.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4931: pakṣapātena tan-nāmni mṛge padme ca tad-dṛśi // RBhrs_3,2.97 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4936: mahyaṃ na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.98 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4945: hā hanta hā hanta kathaṃ nayāmi // RBhrs_3,2.100 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4949: mano mama manāg api kvacid anāpnuvan nirvṛtiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4950: kṣaṇārdham api manyate vraja-mahendra varṣa-vrajam // RBhrs_3,2.101 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4952: Not found in any of the three centuries.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:4959: laghur aghahara kīṭād apy ahaṃ kūṭa-karmā /
GR14ruphbr_u:4965: bhaven na hi yayoḥ padaṃ madhurima-śriyām āspadaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:4966: padāmbujanakhāṅkurād api visāri rocis tava // RBhrs_3,2.104 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4971: hari hari niḥśvasato niśāḥ prayāti // RBhrs_3,2.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4974: mac-cāpalaṃ ca tava vā mama vādhigamyam /
GR14ruphbr_u:4984: kṛṣṇa-graha-gṛhītātmā na veda jagad īdṛśam // RBhrs_3,2.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4987: tanuṃ bibhrad bhavyaḥ pratikṛtir ivāste dvija-patiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:4989: puraḥ śyāmāmbhode bata vinihitā dṛṣṭir amunā // RBhrs_3,2.109 //
GR14ruphbr_u:4991: nadati kvacid utkaṇṭho vilajjo nṛtyati kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:4994: kvacin naṭati niṣpaṭaṃ kvacid asambhavaṃ stambhate
GR14ruphbr_u:4995: kvacid vihasati sphuṭaṃ kvacid amandam ākrandati /
GR14ruphbr_u:4996: lasaty analasaṃ kvacit kvacid apārtham ārtāyate
GR14ruphbr_u:5007: kṣipata nanu satīrthāś ceṣṭatāṃ prāṇa-haṃsaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.113 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5016: adhṛtir jaḍatā vyādhir unmādo mūrcchitaṃ budhaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5019: arāgitā tu sarvasminn adhṛtiḥ kathitā budhaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5020: anye 'ṣṭau prakaṭārthatvāt tāpādyā na hi lakṣitāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5025: taṃ smārayan munipate dahatīha sabhyān // RBhrs_3,2.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5033: kṣaṇadāḥ kṣaṇa-dāyitojjhitā bahulāśve bahulās tadābhavan // RBhrs_3,2.120 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5036: na kila kuṭumbam ihāsti nas trilokyām /
GR14ruphbr_u:5038: kvacid api na vyavatiṣṭhate 'dya cetaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5047: svedāśrubhir na hi paraṃ jalatām avāpur
GR14ruphbr_u:5062: vraja-bhuvi tathā nāsīn nidrā-lavo 'pi yathā purā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5064: satatam adhunā niśceṣṭāṅgās taṭāny adhiśerate // RBhrs_3,2.126 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5069: na kila vasatim ārtāḥ kartum icchanti haṃsāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5070: aśivatvān na ghaṭate bhakte kutrāpy asau mṛtiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5073: kṛṣṇena saṅgamo yas tu sa yoga iti kīrtyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:5074: yoge 'pi kathitaḥ siddhis tuṣṭiḥ sthitir iti tridhā // RBhrs_3,2.129 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5076: utkaṇṭhite hareḥ prāptiḥ siddhir ity abhidhīyate // RBhrs_3,2.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5081: mandaṃ mandam aye ka eṣa mathurā-vīthīṃ mitho gāhate // RBhrs_3,2.131 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5086: jāte viyoge kaṃsāreḥ samprāptis tuṣṭir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5094: dāruko dvārakā-dvāri tatra citra-daśāṃ yayau // RBhrs_3,2.135 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5096: saha-vāso mukundena sthitir nigaditā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.136 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5098: {*This actually appears to be a mix of verses 50-51. Check my comment in Mystic Poetry.}--
GR14ruphbr_u:5104: puras tasya niveśādyā yoge 'mīṣāṃ kriyā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.138 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5106: bhavatvam eva niścitya na rasāvasthatāṃ jaguḥ // RBhrs_3,2.139 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5107: iti tāvad asādhīyo yat purāṇeṣu keṣucit /
GR14ruphbr_u:5108: śrīmad-bhāgavate caiṣa prakaṭo dṛśyate rasaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.140 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5113: bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.141 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5120: kintu kālādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt kvacit syāt sīma-laṅghanam // RBhrs_3,2.143 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5123: sā vibhāvādibhiḥ puṣṭā gaurava-prītir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.144 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5125: hariś ca tasya lālyāś ca bhavanty ālambanā iha // RBhrs_3,2.145 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5130: hitam iha nijayāgre ceṣṭayaivātmajān naḥ // RBhrs_3,2.146 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5132: rakṣī lālaka ity ādyair guṇair ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,2.147 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5145: ghrātāś ca mūrdhni parirabhya bhavanty adasrāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5146: sāmbādayaḥ kati purā vidadhus tapāṃsi // RBhrs_3,2.150 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5147: rukmiṇī-nandanas teṣu lālyeṣu pravaro mataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.151 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5150: janayati janeṣu janaka-bhrāntiṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu rūpeṇa // RBhrs_3,2.152 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5153: sa eṣa paramo gurur garuḍa-go yadūnāṃ patiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5154: yataḥ kim api lālanaṃ vayam avāpya daroddhurāḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5155: purārim api saṅgare guru-ruṣaṃ tiraskurmahe // RBhrs_3,2.153 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5158: lālyānāṃ tu sva-sambandha-sphūrter eva samantataḥ // RBhrs_3,2.154 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5174: bhuvam abhi makarāṅko rāṅkavaṃ svīcakāra // RBhrs_3,2.159 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5182: dvandve dṛśoḥ padam asau kila niṣprakampā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5191: naṭaiś ca hṛṣyadbhir akāri nṛtyam // RBhrs_3,2.164 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5193: dhanyaḥ sāmba bhavān sa-riṅgaṇam ayan pārśve rajaḥ-karbūro
GR14ruphbr_u:5194: yas tātena vikṛṣya vatsalatayā svotsaṅgam āropitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5195: dhiṅ māṃ durbhagam atra śaṅkara-mayair durdaiva-visphūrjitaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5196: prāptā na kṣaṇikāpi lālana-ratiḥ sā yena bālye pituḥ // RBhrs_3,2.165 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5199: tanmayī lālake prītir gaurava-prītir ucyate // RBhrs_3,2.166 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5200: sthāyi-bhāvo 'tra sā caiṣām āmūlāt svayam ucchritā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5201: kañcid viśeṣam āpannā premeti sneha ity api /
GR14ruphbr_u:5202: rāga ity ucyate cātra gaurava-prītir eva sā // RBhrs_3,2.167 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5206: dhīraḥ paraṃ kim api saṅkucatīṃ jhaṣāṅko
GR14ruphbr_u:5210: karād ākṛṣyaiva prasabham abhimanyāv api hate /
GR14ruphbr_u:5212: prapede kalyāṇī na hi malinimānaṃ lavam api // RBhrs_3,2.169 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5217: nidhehi savidhe pituḥ kathaya vatsa kaḥ sambhramaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.170 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5222: viṣam iva tāṃ tu sudhāṃ sa eva sadyaḥ // RBhrs_3,2.171 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5223: triṣv evāyoga-yogādyā bhedāḥ pūrvavad īritāḥ // RBhrs_3,2.172 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5235: militaḥ śambara-purato madanaḥ purato vilokayan pitaram /
GR14ruphbr_u:5236: ko 'ham iti svaṃ pramadān na dhīr adhīr apy asau veda // RBhrs_3,2.175 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5239: ajani mudā yadu-nagare sambhrama-bhūmā kumārāṇām // RBhrs_3,2.176 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5242: vandate pādayor dvandvaṃ pituḥ prati-dinaṃ smaraḥ // RBhrs_3,2.177 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5243: utkaṇṭhita-viyogādye yad yad vistāritaṃ na hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:5244: sambhrama-prītivaj jñeyaṃ tat tad evākhilaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,2.178 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5252: nītaś citte satāṃ puṣṭiṃ rasaḥ preyān udīryate // RBhrs_3,3.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5254: hariś ca tad-vayasyāś ca tasminn ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5256: dvibhujatvādi-bhāg atra prāgvad ālambano hariḥ // RBhrs_3,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5261: vrajād aghaharo haraty ahaha naḥ sakhīnāṃ manaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5264: sakhyenojjvalitais tathā jalajayor āḍhyaṃ caturbhir bhujaiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5271: sukhī varīyān ity ādyā guṇās tasyeha kīrtitā // RBhrs_3,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5280: te pura-vraja-sambandhād dvi-vidhāḥ prāya īritāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5282: arjuno bhīmasenaś ca duhitā drupadasya ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:5285: śirasi nṛpatir drag aghrāsīd aghārim adhīra-dhīr
GR14ruphbr_u:5288: tam avaśādhiyaḥ prauḍhānandād arundhata pāṇḍavāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5303: ataḥ sarva-vayasyeṣu pradhānatvaṃ bhajanty amī // RBhrs_3,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5308: sadā praṇaya-śālinaḥ sahacarā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5310: unnidrasya yayus tavātra viratiṃ sapta-kṣapās tiṣṭhato
GR14ruphbr_u:5311: hanta śrānta ivāsi nikṣipa sakhe śrīdāma-pāṇau girim /
GR14ruphbr_u:5312: ādhir vidhyati nas tvam arpaya kare kiṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ dakṣiṇe
GR14ruphbr_u:5313: doṣṇas te karavāma kāmam adhunā savyasya saṃvāhanam // RBhrs_3,3.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5323: kṣaṇam aham avasīdan śūnya-cittas tadāsam // RBhrs_3,3.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5324: suhṛdaś ca sakhāyaś ca tathā priya-sakhāḥ pare /
GR14ruphbr_u:5325: priya-narma-vayasyāś cety uktā goṣṭhe catur-vidhāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5328: sāyudhās tasya duṣṭebhyaḥ sadā rakṣā-parāyaṇāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5331: vijayo balabhadrādyāḥ suhṛdas tasya kīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5333: dhunvan dhāvasi maṇḍalāgram amalaṃ tvaṃ maṇḍalībhadra kiṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5334: gurvīṃ nārya gadāṃ gṛhāṇa vijaya kṣobhaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5335: śaktiṃ na kṣipa bhadravardhana puro govardhanaṃ gāhate
GR14ruphbr_u:5336: garjann eṣa ghano balī na tu balīvardākṛtir dānavaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5343: sukhaṃ svapitu naḥ suhṛd vraja-niśānta-madhye niśi /
GR14ruphbr_u:5344: ahaṃ śirasi mardanaṃ mṛdu karomi karṇe kathāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5345: tvam asya visṛjann alaṃ subala sakthinī lālaya // RBhrs_3,3.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5354: iti subala girā me sandiśa tvaṃ mukundaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5365: yad ugra-bhuja-saṅgare gurum agāt klamaṃ naḥ sakhā // RBhrs_3,3.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5366: sarveṣu sakhiṣu śreṣṭho devaprastho 'yam īritaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5373: śrīdāmnaḥ pṛthulāṃ bhujām abhi śiro vinyasya viśrāmiṇaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5375: madhye sundari kandarasya padayoḥ saṃvāhanena priyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5376: devaprastha itaḥ kṛtī sukhayati premṇā vrajendrātmajam // RBhrs_3,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5379: śrīdāmā ca sudāmā ca dāmā ca vasudāmakaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5386: prasārya bhujayor yugaṃ pulaki kaścid āśliṣyati /
GR14ruphbr_u:5387: kareṇa calatā dṛśau nibhṛtam etya rundhe paraḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5388: kṛśāṅgi sukhayanty amī priya-sakhāḥ sakhāyaṃ tava // RBhrs_3,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5389: eṣu priya-vayasyeṣu śrīdāmā pravaro mataḥ // RBhrs_3,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5396: tvaṃ naḥ projjhya kaṭhora yāmuna-taṭe kasmād akasmād gato
GR14ruphbr_u:5397: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭim ito 'si hanta niviḍāśleṣaiḥ sakhīn prīṇaya /
GR14ruphbr_u:5398: brūmaḥ satyam adarśane tava manāk kā dhenavaḥ ke vayaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5399: kiṃ goṣṭhaṃ kim abhīṣṭam ity acirataḥ sarvaṃ viparyasyati // RBhrs_3,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5405: rādhā-sandeśa-vṛndaṃ kathayati subalaḥ paśya kṛṣṇasya karṇe
GR14ruphbr_u:5407: pālī-tāmbūlam āsye vitarati caturaḥ kokilo mūrdhni dhatte
GR14ruphbr_u:5408: tārā-dāmeti narma-praṇayi-sahacarās tanvi tanvanti sevām // RBhrs_3,3.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5427: dūtaḥ sameti sakhi yatra milaty adūre /
GR14ruphbr_u:5429: kā vā vṛṣasyati na gopa-vṛṣaṃ kiśorī // RBhrs_3,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5435: tad iyam aghahara tvām eti sarvādhvanaiva // RBhrs_3,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5436: eteṣu ke 'pi śāstreṣu ke 'pi lokeṣu viśrutāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5437: nitya-priyāḥ sura-carāḥ sādhakāś ceti te tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5438: kecid eṣu sthirā jātyā mantrivat tam upāsate // RBhrs_3,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5440: kecid ārjava-sāreṇa saralāḥ śīlayanti tam // RBhrs_3,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5443: saumyāḥ sūnṛtayā vācā dhanyā dhinvanti taṃ pare // RBhrs_3,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5444: evaṃ vividhayā sarve prakṛtyā madhurā amī /
GR14ruphbr_u:5454: kaumāraṃ vatsale vācyaṃ tataḥ saṅkṣipya likhyate // RBhrs_3,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5456: bibhrad veṇuṃ jaṭhara-paṭayoḥ śṛṅga-vetre ca kakṣe
GR14ruphbr_u:5458: tiṣṭhan madhye sva-parisuhṛdo hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5459: svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajña-bhug bāla-keliḥ // RBhrs_3,3.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5461: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ paugaṇḍaṃ ca tridhā bhavet // RBhrs_3,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5464: kambu-grīvodgamādyaṃ ca paugaṇḍe prathame sati // RBhrs_3,3.62 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5466: tundaṃ vindati te mukunda śanakair aśvattha-patra-śriyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5467: kaṇṭhaṃ kambuvad ambujākṣa bhajate rekhā-trayīm ujjvalām /
GR14ruphbr_u:5469: lakṣmīr ādhunikī dhinoti suhṛdām akṣīṇi sā kāpy asau // RBhrs_3,3.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5477: karṇābhyāṃ karṇikāre dadhad alam urasā phulla-mallīka-mālyaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5478: nṛtyan dor-yuddha-raṅge naṭavad iha sakhīn nandayaty eṣa kṛṣṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5481: pārśvādy-aṅgaṃ suvalitaṃ paugaṇḍe sati madhyame // RBhrs_3,3.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5489: bhāṇḍīre krīḍanaṃ śailoddhāraṇādyaṃ ca ceṣṭitam // RBhrs_3,3.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5494: paśya krīḍan sukhayati sakhe mitra-vṛndaṃ mukundaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5499: aṃsayos tuṅgatety ādi paugaṇḍe carame sati // RBhrs_3,3.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5504: nyasyann eva priya-savayasāṃ gokulān nirjihīte // RBhrs_3,3.73 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5510: veṣaḥ keśava peśalaḥ subalam apy āghūrṇayaty adya te
GR14ruphbr_u:5511: vikrāntaṃ kim uta svabhāva-mṛdulāṃ goṣṭhābalānāṃ tatim // RBhrs_3,3.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5515: dhūrtas tvaṃ yad avaiṣi hṛd-gatam ataḥ karṇe tava vyāhare
GR14ruphbr_u:5518: pañceṣur jagatāṃ jaye nija-dhurāṃ yatrārpayan mādyati // RBhrs_3,3.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5520: kaiśoraṃ pūrvam evoktaṃ saṅkṣepeṇocyate tataḥ // RBhrs_3,3.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5527: tena yauvana-śobhāsya neha kācit prapañcitā // RBhrs_3,3.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5530: sakhīn kevalam evedaṃ dhāmnā dhīman dhinoti naḥ // RBhrs_3,3.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5535: api nivahāḥ samam eva jāgrati sma // RBhrs_3,3.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5543: pañcāsya paśya muditāḥ pañcāsya-pratimāṃ yayuḥ // RBhrs_3,3.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5548: priya-sakhi subalo 'bhūd vismitaḥ sa-smitaś ca // RBhrs_3,3.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5561: prāyaḥ puraḥsaratvādyāḥ suhṛdām īritāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.90 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5568: tābhiḥ keli-kalau sākṣāt sakhyuḥ pakṣa-parigrahaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.93 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5572: puras tauryatrikaṃ tasya gavāṃ sambhālana-kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.95 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5574: etāḥ sādhāraṇā dāsair vayasyānāṃ kriyā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5575: pūrvokteṣv aparāś cātra jñeyā dhīrair yathocitam // RBhrs_3,3.96 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5588: api guru-puras tvām utsaṅge nidhāya visaṅkaṭe
GR14ruphbr_u:5590: praṇayati tava skandhe cāsau bhujaṃ bhujagopamaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5591: kva subala purā siddha-kṣetre cakatha kiyat-tapaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.99 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5604: rase preyasi bhāva-jñaiḥ kathitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.102 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5605: tatrāyoge madaṃ harṣaṃ garvaṃ nidrāṃ dhṛtiṃ vinā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5606: yoge mṛtiṃ klamaṃ vyādhiṃ vināpasmṛti-dīnate // RBhrs_3,3.103 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5613: vimukta-sambhramā yā syād viśrambhātmā ratir dvayoḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5614: prāyaḥ samānayor atra sā sakhya-sthāyi-śabda-bhāk // RBhrs_3,3.105 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5616: eṣā sakhya-ratir vṛddhiṃ gacchantī praṇayaḥ kramāt /
GR14ruphbr_u:5617: premā snehas tathā rāga iti pañca-bhidoditā // RBhrs_3,3.106 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5620: garuḍāṅka guḍākeśas tvāṃ kadā parirapsyate // RBhrs_3,3.107 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5623: tad-gandhenāpy asaṃspṛṣṭā ratiḥ praṇaya ucyate // RBhrs_3,3.108 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5628: samaskuruta pāṃśumān śirasi candrakān arjunaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.109 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5631: mukunda vasatir vane para-gṛhe ca dāsya-kriyā /
GR14ruphbr_u:5632: iyaṃ sphuṭam amaṅgalā bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ gatiḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:5633: parantu vavṛdhe tvayi dvi-guṇam eva sakhyāmṛtam // RBhrs_3,3.110 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5636: gāyanti sma mahārāja sneha-klinna-dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ // RBhrs_3,3.111 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5640: yā prāg āsta sarasvatī drutam asau līnopakaṇṭha-sthale
GR14ruphbr_u:5641: yā nāsīd udagād dṛśoḥ pathi sadā nīrorudhāvātra sā // RBhrs_3,3.112 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5657: davasya kavalād api tvam avitātra yeṣām abhūḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5659: kathaṃ na viraha-jvarād avasitān sakhīn adya naḥ // RBhrs_3,3.116 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5660: atrāpi pūrvavat proktās tāpādyās tā daśā daśa // RBhrs_3,3.117 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5665: balīyān uttāpas tava viraha-janmā jvalayati // RBhrs_3,3.118 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5670: samīrasya ghrānādhvani pṛthulatā kevalam abhūt // RBhrs_3,3.119 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5679: na hi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhajati caṭulaṃ tulam iva me
GR14ruphbr_u:5680: nirālambaṃ cetaḥ kvacid api vilambaṃ lavam api // RBhrs_3,3.121 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5684: kim aparam iha vācyaṃ jīvite 'py adya dhatte
GR14ruphbr_u:5685: yaduvara virahāt te nārthitāṃ bandhu-vargaḥ // RBhrs_3,3.122 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5690: sphurati suhṛdāṃ gaṇāḥ śikhara-jāta-vṛkṣā iva // RBhrs_3,3.123 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5693: yaduvīra taṭe viceṣṭate ciram ābhīra-kumāra-maṇḍalī // RBhrs_3,3.124 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5697: luṇṭhanti bhuvi śerate bata hasanti dhāvanty amī
GR14ruphbr_u:5698: rudanti mathurā-pate kim api vallavānāṃ gaṇāḥ // RBhrs_3,3.125 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5707: vāraṃ vāram akharva-locana-jalair āplāvya tān niścalān
GR14ruphbr_u:5708: śocanty adya yathā ciraṃ paricaya-snigdhāḥ kuraṅgā api // RBhrs_3,3.127 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5710: kṛṣṇena viprayogaḥ syān na jātu vraja-vāsinām // RBhrs_3,3.128 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5712: vatsair vatsatarībhiś ca sadā krīḍati mādhavaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5716: citrākāraṃ bhajann eva mitrākāram adarśayat // RBhrs_3,3.130 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5731: kiṃ varṇyate diṣṭam ato vrajaukasām // RBhrs_3,3.133 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5733: preyān kām api puṣṇāti rasaś citta-camatkṛtim // RBhrs_3,3.134 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5734: prīte ca vatsale cāpi kṛṣṇa-tad-bhaktayoḥ punaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5736: preyān eva bhavet preyān ataḥ sarva-raseṣv ayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:5744: vibhāvādyais tu vātsalyaṃ sthāyī puṣṭim upāgataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5745: eṣa vatsala-nāmātra prokto bhakti-raso budhaiḥ // RBhrs_3,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5747: kṛṣṇaṃ tasya gurūṃś cātra prāhur ālambanān budhāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5755: dātety-ādi-guṇo kṛṣṇo vibhāva iti kathyate // RBhrs_3,4.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5759: trayyā copaniṣadbhiś ca sāṅkhya-yogaiś ca sātvataiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5762: viṣṇur nityam upāsyate sakhi mayā tenātra nītāḥ kṣayaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5764: pratyakṣaṃ girir eṣa goṣṭa-patinā rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ dhṛtas
GR14ruphbr_u:5765: tat-tat-karma duranvayaṃ mama śiśoḥ kenāsya sambhāvyate // RBhrs_3,4.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5768: lālakatvādināpy atra vibhāvā guravo matāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5774: te tu tasyātra kathitā vraja-rājñī vrajeśvaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5775: rohiṇī tāś ca vallavyo yāḥ padmaja-hṛtātmajāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5789: śyāma-śyāma-rucir vicitra-sicayā goṣṭheśvarī pātu vaḥ // RBhrs_3,4.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5793: snuvānā pratyūṣe diśati ca bhuje kārmaṇam asau
GR14ruphbr_u:5809: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaumāraṃ tri-vidhaṃ matam // RBhrs_3,4.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5812: pravyakta-mārdavatvaṃ ca kaumāre prathame sati // RBhrs_3,4.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5823: kṣaṇam iha virudantaṃ smera-vaktraṃ kṣaṇaṃ sā
GR14ruphbr_u:5824: tilam api viratāsīn nekṣituṃ goṣṭha-rājñī // RBhrs_3,4.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5826: paṭṭa-ḍorī kaṭau haste sūtram ity ādi maṇḍanam // RBhrs_3,4.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5831: vrajeśa-gṛhiṇī sutaṃ na kila vīkṣya tṛptiṃ yayau // RBhrs_3,4.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5834: kalokti-riṅganādyaṃ ca kaumāre sati madhyame // RBhrs_3,4.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5839: tanayam amṛta-sindhau prekṣya mātā nyamāṅkṣīt // RBhrs_3,4.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5841: kiṅkiṇy-ādi ca kaṭyādau prasādhanam ihoditam // RBhrs_3,4.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5848: atra kiñcit kṛśaṃ madhyam īṣat-prathima-bhāg uraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5849: śiraś ca kāka-pakṣāḍhyaṃ kaumāre carame sati // RBhrs_3,4.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5861: kare ca laguḍīṃ laghuṃ savayasāṃ kulair āvṛtaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5862: avann iha śakṛt-karīn parisare vrajasya priye
GR14ruphbr_u:5863: sutas tava kṛtārthayaty ahaha paśya netrāṇi naḥ // RBhrs_3,4.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5865: paugaṇḍādi puraivoktaṃ tena saṅkṣipya likhyate // RBhrs_3,4.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5870: vraja-bhuvi mama vatsaḥ kacca-deśād upaiti // RBhrs_3,4.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5884: mātuḥ pramoda-bharam eva haris tanoti // RBhrs_3,4.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5886: prekṣya prekṣya diśaḥ sa-śaṅkam asakṛn mandaṃ padaṃ nikṣipan
GR14ruphbr_u:5887: nāyāty eṣa latāntare sphuṭam ito gavyaṃ hariṣyan hariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:5889: trasyal-locanam asya śuṣyad-adharaṃ ramyaṃ didṛkṣe mukham // RBhrs_3,4.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5899: ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te // RBhrs_3,4.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5906: upālambhādayaś cātra mitraiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_3,4.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5908: navātra sāttvikāḥ stanya-srāvaḥ stambhādayaś ca te // RBhrs_3,4.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5914: matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan // RBhrs_3,4.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5919: tava navam abhiṣekaṃ dugdha-pūraiḥ karoti // RBhrs_3,4.47 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5921: katham api parirabdhuṃ na kṣamā stabdha-gātrī
GR14ruphbr_u:5923: na ca sutam upadeṣṭuṃ ruddha-kaṇṭhī samarthā
GR14ruphbr_u:5924: dadhatam acalam āsīd vyākulā gokuleśā // RBhrs_3,4.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5938: ratiḥ saivātra vātsalyaṃ sthāyī bhāvo nigadyate // RBhrs_3,4.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5940: premavat snehavad bhāti kadācit kila rāgavat // RBhrs_3,4.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5944: mūrdhny upāghrāya paramāṃ mudaṃ lebhe kurūdvaha // RBhrs_3,4.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5948: gehād aṅganam aṅganāt punar asau gehaṃ viśanty ākulā
GR14ruphbr_u:5949: govindasya muhur vrajendra-gṛhiṇī panthānam ālokate // RBhrs_3,4.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5959: premā vallava-nāthayor atitarām ullāsam evāyayau // RBhrs_3,4.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5964: vṛttāsi vraja-rājñi tat-suta-mukha-prekṣāṃ sphuṭaṃ vāñchasi // RBhrs_3,4.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5969: sthitā yadi na tatra te vadana-padmam udvīkṣyate // RBhrs_3,4.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5985: paśya srasta-tanuḥ kaṭhora-luṭhanair dehe vraṇaṃ kurvatī /
GR14ruphbr_u:5986: kṣīṇā goṣṭha-mahī-mahendra-mahiṣī hā putra putrety asau
GR14ruphbr_u:5987: krośantī karayor yugena kurute kaṣṭād uras-tāḍanam // RBhrs_3,4.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5988: bahūnām api sad-bhāve viyoge 'tra tu kecana /
GR14ruphbr_u:5990: unmāda-mohāv ity ādyā atyudrekaṃ vrajanty amī // RBhrs_3,4.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:5992: manda-spandam abhūt klamair alaghubhiḥ sandānitaṃ mānasaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:5994: niśvāsaiḥ sravad eva pākam ayate stanyaṃ ca taptair idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6000: śirasi kuliśaṃ hanta kṣiptaṃ śvaphalka-sutena me // RBhrs_3,4.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6002: dhig astu hata-jīvitaṃ niravadhi-śriyo 'py adya me
GR14ruphbr_u:6003: yayā na hi hareḥ śiraḥ snuta-kucāgram āghrāyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6004: sadā nava-sudhā-duhām api gavāṃ parārdhaṃ ca dhik
GR14ruphbr_u:6005: sa luñcati na cañcalaḥ surabhi-gandhi yāsāṃ dadhi // RBhrs_3,4.67 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6017: kim iva kurute harmye tiṣṭhann ayaṃ nirapatrapo
GR14ruphbr_u:6018: vrajapatir iti brūte mugdho 'yam atra mudā janaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6019: ahaha tanayaṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi priyaṃ parihṛtya taṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6020: kaṭhina-hṛdayo goṣṭhe svairī praviśya sukhīyati // RBhrs_3,4.70 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6022: kva me putro nīpāḥ kathayata kuraṅgāḥ kim iha vaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6023: sa babhrāmābhyarṇe bhaṇata tam udantaṃ madhukarāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6025: bhavantaṃ pṛcchantī diśi diśi yaśodā vicarati // RBhrs_3,4.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6027: kuṭumbini manas taṭe vidhuratāṃ vidhatse kathaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6028: prasāraya dṛśaṃ manāk tava sutaḥ puro vartate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6029: idaṃ gṛhiṇi gṛhaṃ na kuru śūnyam ity ākulaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6030: sa śocati tava prasūṃ yadu-kulendra nandaḥ pitā // RBhrs_3,4.72 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6048: tava muhur atiharṣād varṣati kṣīra-dhārām // RBhrs_3,4.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6049: svīkurvate rasam imaṃ nāṭya-jñā api kecana // RBhrs_3,4.77 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6051: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6055: preyasas tu tirobhāvo vatsalaysāsya na kṣatiḥ // RBhrs_3,4.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6057: tatra keṣucid apy asyāḥ saṅkulatvam udīryate // RBhrs_3,4.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6059: yudhiṣṭhirasya vātsalyaṃ prītyā sakhyena cānvitam // RBhrs_3,4.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6065: evaṃ keṣucid anyeṣu vijñeyaṃ bhāva-miśraṇam // RBhrs_3,4.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6072: ātmocitair vibhāvādyaiḥ puṣṭiṃ nītā satāṃ hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6073: madhurākhyo bhaved bhakti-raso 'sau madhurā ratiḥ // RBhrs_3,5.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6075: rahasyatvāc ca saṃkṣipya vitatāṇgo vilikhyate // RBhrs_3,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6077: asmin ālambanaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ priyās tasya tu subhruvaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6080: āśrayatvena madhure harir ālambano mataḥ // RBhrs_3,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6085: śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdho hariḥ krīḍati // RBhrs_3,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6091: preyasīṣu harer āsu pravarā vārṣabhānavī // RBhrs_3,5.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6100: rādhā lāghavam apy anādara-girāṃ bhaṅgībhir ātanvatī
GR14ruphbr_u:6101: maitrī-gauravato 'py asau śata-guṇāṃ mat-prītim evādadhe // RBhrs_3,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6105: rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ // RBhrs_3,5.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6120: krāntvā sapta jaganti samprati vayaṃ sarvordhvam adhyāsmahe // RBhrs_3,5.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6128: ālasyaugrye vinā sarve vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6134: nālambituṃ katham api kṣamate 'dya jīvaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6141: sthāyī bhāvo bhavaty atra pūrvoktā madhurā ratiḥ // RBhrs_3,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6147: rādhā-mādhavayor eva kvāpi bhāvaiḥ kadāpy asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:6150: ito dūre rājñī sphurati parito mitra-paṭalī
GR14ruphbr_u:6151: dṛśor agre candrāvalir upari śailasya danujaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6153: anta-śrīr lolā taḍid iva mukundasya valate // RBhrs_3,5.22 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6154: ghorā khaṇḍita-śaṅkhacūḍam ajiraṃ rundhe śivā tāmasī
GR14ruphbr_u:6157: rādhāyās tad api praphullam abhajan mlāniṃ na bhāvāmbujam // RBhrs_3,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6160: sa pūrva-rāgo mānaś ca pravāsādi-mayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6161: vipralambho bahu-vidho vidvadbhir iha kathyate // RBhrs_3,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6163: prāg-asaṅgatayor bhāvaḥ pūrva-rāgo bhaved dvayoḥ // RBhrs_3,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6165: akasmād ekasmin pathi sakhi mayā yāmuna-taṭaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6167: sa dṛg-bhaṅgyā kiṃ vākuruta na hi jāne tata idaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6168: mano me vyālolaṃ kvacana gṛha-kṛtyo na lagate // RBhrs_3,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6170: yathā vinidrā yac cittā rukmiṇī kamalekṣaṇā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6171: tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6172: vedāhaṃ rukmiṇyā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ // RBhrs_3,5.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6179: mukhara-nikhare līnā dīnāpy uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm // RBhrs_3,5.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6189: na bhuṅkte na svapiti ca cintayan vo hy aharniśam // RBhrs_3,5.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6191: dvayor militayor bhogaḥ sambhoga iti kīrtyate // RBhrs_3,5.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6211: tanutāṃ sanātanātmā bhagavān mayi sarvadā tuṣṭim // RBhrs_4,1.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6213: rasaḥ sapta-vidho gauṇo maitrī-vaira-sthitir mithaḥ // RBhrs_4,1.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6214: rasābhāsāś ca tenātra laharyo nava kīrtitāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6215: prāg atrāniyatādhārāḥ kadācit kvāpy uditvarāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6216: gauṇā bhakti-rasāḥ sapta lekhyā hāsyādayaḥ kramāt // RBhrs_4,1.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6217: bhaktānāṃ pañcadhoktānām eṣāṃ madhyata eva hi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6218: kvāpy ekaḥ kvāpy anekaś ca gauṇeṣv ālambano mataḥ // RBhrs_4,1.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6221: hāsya-bhakti-raso nāma budhair eṣa nigadyate // RBhrs_4,1.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6223: vṛddhāḥ śiśu-mukhāḥ prāyaḥ proktā dhīrais tad-āśrayāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6224: vibhāvanādi-vaiśiṣṭyāt pravarāś ca kvacin matāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6226: yāsyāmy asya na bhīṣaṇasya savidhaṃ jīrṇasya śīrṇākṛter
GR14ruphbr_u:6227: mātar neṣyati māṃ pidhāya kapaṭād ādhārikāyām asau /
GR14ruphbr_u:6228: ity uktvā cakitākṣam adbhuta-śiśāv udvīkṣyamāṇe harau
GR14ruphbr_u:6229: hāsyaṃ tasya niruddhato 'py atitarāṃ vyaktaṃ tadāsīn muneḥ // RBhrs_4,1.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6231: yac ceṣṭā kṛṣṇa-viṣayā proktaḥ so 'tra tad-anvayī // RBhrs_4,1.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6233: dadāmi dadhi-phāṇitaṃ vivṛṇu vaktram ity agrato
GR14ruphbr_u:6235: tayā kusumam arpitaṃ navam avetya bhugnānane
GR14ruphbr_u:6236: harau jahasur uddhuraṃ kim api suṣṭhu goṣṭhārbhakāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6238: asya prekṣya karaṃ śiśor munipate śyāmasya me kathyatāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6239: tathyaṃ hanta cirāyur eṣa bhavitā kiṃ dhenu-koṭīśvaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6240: ity ukte bhagavan mayādya paritaś cīreṇa kiṃ cāruṇā
GR14ruphbr_u:6241: drāg āvirbhavad-uddhura-smitam idaṃ vaktraṃ tvayā rudhyate // RBhrs_4,1.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6246: ṣoḍhā hāsa-ratiḥ syāt smita-hasite vihasitāvahasite ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6247: apahasitātihasitake jyeṣṭhādīnāṃ kramād dve dve // RBhrs_4,1.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6249: bhaved vihasitādyaṃ ca bhāvajñair iti bhaṇyate // RBhrs_4,1.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6253: kva yāmi jaratī khalā dadhi-haraṃ didhīrṣanty asau
GR14ruphbr_u:6254: pradhāvati javena māṃ subala maṅkṣu rakṣāṃ kuru /
GR14ruphbr_u:6256: vikasvara-mukhāmbujaṃ kulam abhūn munīnāṃ divi // RBhrs_4,1.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6258: tad eva dara-saṃlakṣya-dantāgraṃ hasitaṃ bhavet // RBhrs_4,1.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6260: mad-vaśena puraḥ-sthito harir asau putro 'ham evāsmi te
GR14ruphbr_u:6262: mām eti skhalad-akṣare jaṭilayā vyākruśya niṣkāsite
GR14ruphbr_u:6263: putre prāṅgataḥ sakhī-kulam abhūd dantāṃśu-dhautādharam // RBhrs_4,1.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6265: sa-svanaṃ dṛṣṭa-daśanaṃ bhaved vihasitaṃ tu tat // RBhrs_4,1.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6267: muṣāṇa dadhi meduraṃ viphalam antarā śaṅkase
GR14ruphbr_u:6270: kṛtaṃ hasitam utsvanaṃ kapaṭa-suptayā vṛddhayā // RBhrs_4,1.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6274: lagnas te nitarāṃ dṛśor api yuge kiṃ dhātu-rāgo ghanaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6275: prātaḥ putra balasya vā kim asitaṃ vāsas tvayāṅge dhṛtam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6277: dūtī saṅkucad-īkṣaṇāvahasitaṃ jātā na roddhuṃ kṣamā // RBhrs_4,1.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6284: jaratyāḥ prastobhān naṭati tad anaiṣīd dṛśam asau // RBhrs_4,1.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6286: sahasra-tālaṃ kṣiptāṅgaṃ tac cātihasitaṃ viduḥ // RBhrs_4,1.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6288: vṛddhe tvaṃ valitānanāsi valibhiḥ prekṣya suyogyām atas
GR14ruphbr_u:6289: tvām udvoḍhum asau balī-mukha-varo māṃ sādhayaty utsukaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6290: ābhir vipluta-dhīr vṛṇe na hi paraṃ tvatto bali-dhvaṃsanād
GR14ruphbr_u:6291: ity uccair mukharā-girā vijahasuḥ sottālikā bālikāḥ // RBhrs_4,1.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6292: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6297: kā tvattaḥ kuṭile parāsti jaṭilā-putri kṣitau sundarī
GR14ruphbr_u:6298: puṇyena vraja-subhruvāṃ tava dhṛtiṃ hartuṃ na vaṃśī kṣamā // RBhrs_4,1.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6308: sā vismaya-ratir nītād- bhuto-bhakti-raso bhavet // RBhrs_4,2.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6315: sākṣād anumitaṃ ceti tac ca dvividham ucyate // RBhrs_4,2.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6324: citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak /
GR14ruphbr_u:6325: gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat // RBhrs_4,2.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6330: khelann iva sphurati hanta kim indra-jālam // RBhrs_4,2.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6332: yāny akṣipan praharaṇāni bhaṭāḥ sa devaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6338: vatsāś ceti vadan kṛto 'smi vivaśaḥ stambha-śriyā paśyata /
GR14ruphbr_u:6339: āścaryaṃ kathayāmi vaḥ śṛṇuta bhoḥ pratyekam ekaikaśaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6340: stūyante jagad-aṇḍavadbhir abhitas te hanta padmāsanaiḥ // RBhrs_4,2.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6346: apriyādeḥ kriyā kuryān nālaukiky api vismayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6347: asādhāraṇy api manāk karoty eva priyasya sā // RBhrs_4,2.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6349: ity atra vismaye proktā raty-anugraha-mādhurī // RBhrs_4,2.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6359: ālambana iha prokta eṣa eva caturvidhaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6360: utsāhas tv eṣa bhaktānāṃ sarveṣām eva sambhavet // RBhrs_4,3.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6363: sakhā bandhu-viśeṣo vā yuddha-vīra ihocyate // RBhrs_4,3.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6364: pratiyoddhā mukundo vā tasmin vā prekṣake sthite /
GR14ruphbr_u:6370: yadi na tvaṃ samarāt parāñcasi // RBhrs_4,3.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6375: śrīdāmnaś ca bakī-dviṣaś ca samarāṭopaḥ paṭīyān abhūt // RBhrs_4,3.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6378: tathādya laguḍaṃ kramād bhramayati sma dāmā kṛtī /
GR14ruphbr_u:6385: jigāya bharata-śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ // RBhrs_4,3.10 // iti /
GR14ruphbr_u:6387: pratiyodha-sthitāḥ santo bhavanty uddīpanā iha // RBhrs_4,3.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6390: jitvā dāmodara yudhi vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ katthitāni /
GR14ruphbr_u:6392: mandradhvāno naṭati nikaṭe stokakṛṣṇaḥ kalāpī // RBhrs_4,3.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6401: divyārgalā pratibhaṭas trapate bhujo me // RBhrs_4,3.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6406: sudāmnaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ jayati muhur āhopuruṣikā // RBhrs_4,3.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6412: jigīṣā stheyasī yuddhe sā yuddhotsāha īryate // RBhrs_4,3.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6420: mā tvaṃ bhaiṣīḥ kṣudra re bhadrasena /
GR14ruphbr_u:6427: hareḥ pramadam ekakaḥ samiti bhadraseno vyadhāt // RBhrs_4,3.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6436: sāhāyyam atra subalaḥ kurute balī cej
GR14ruphbr_u:6438: suhṛd eva pratibhaṭo vīre kṛṣṇasya na tvariḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6439: sa bhakta-kṣobha-kāritvād raudre tv ālambano rase /
GR14ruphbr_u:6440: rāgābhāvo dṛg-ādīnāṃ raudrād asya vibhedakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6442: dvi-vidho dāna-vīraḥ syād ekas tatra bahu-pradaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6445: sahasā dīyate yena svayaṃ sarvasvam apy uta /
GR14ruphbr_u:6446: dāmodarasya saukhyāya procyate sa bahu-pradaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6452: pragāḍhā stheyasī ditsā dānotsāha itīryate // RBhrs_4,3.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6453: dvidhā bahu-prado 'py eṣa vidvadbhir iha kathyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:6454: syād ābhyudayikas tv ekaḥ paras tat-sampradānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6457: arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ sa ābhyudāyiko bhavet // RBhrs_4,3.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6462: iti nijagadur uccair bhūsurā yena tṛptāḥ // RBhrs_4,3.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6465: sarvasvaṃ dīyate yena sa syāt tat-sampradānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6466: tad-dānaṃ prīti-pūjābhyāṃ bhaved ity uditaṃ dvidhā // RBhrs_4,3.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6468: prīti-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad dadyād bandhv-ādi-rūpiṇe // RBhrs_4,3.35 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6472: dattvā rājyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ svam api bhagavate ditsur apy anyad uccair
GR14ruphbr_u:6473: deyaṃ kutrāpy adṛṣṭvā makha-sadasi tadā vyākulaḥ pāṇḍavo 'bhūt // RBhrs_4,3.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6475: pujā-dānaṃ tu tasmai yad vipra-rūpāya dīyate // RBhrs_4,3.37 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6479: sa eva viṣṇur varado 'stu vā paro
GR14ruphbr_u:6480: dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitāṃ mune // RBhrs_4,3.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6483: balinaiva sa yenāsya bhikṣā-pātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6486: hariṇā dīyamāno 'pi sārṣṭy-ādis tuṣyatā varaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6490: atra sañcāritā bhūmnā dhṛter eva samīkṣyate // RBhrs_4,3.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6492: tyāgecchā tādṛśī prauḍhā tyāgotsāha itīryate // RBhrs_4,3.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6497: svāmin kṛtārtho 'smi varaṃ na yāce // RBhrs_4,3.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6500: kiṃ vānyad arpita-bhayaṃ bhruva unnayais te /
GR14ruphbr_u:6504: dhuryādīnāṃ tṛtīyasya vīrasya padavīṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,3.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6510: āśvāsanoktayaḥ sthairyam ity ādyās tatra vikriyāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6511: autsukyam atiharṣādyā jñeyāḥ sañcāriṇo budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,3.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6515: vande kuṭmalitāñjalir muhur ahaṃ vīraṃ mayūra-dhvajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6518: sollāsaṃ krakacena dāritam abhūt patnī-sutābhyāṃ śivaḥ // RBhrs_4,3.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6519: hareś cet tattva-vijñānaṃ naivāsya ghaṭate dayā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6520: tad-abhāve tv asau dāna-vīre 'ntar-bhavati sphuṭam // RBhrs_4,3.52 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6522: kṛtātra dvija-rūpe ca bhaktis tenāsya bhaktatā // RBhrs_4,3.53 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6524: vopadevādayo dhīrā vīram ācakṣate tridhā // RBhrs_4,3.54 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6527: prāyeṇa dhīra-śāntas tu dharma-vīraḥ sa ucyate // RBhrs_4,3.55 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6531: dharmaikābhiniveśas tu dharmotsāho mataḥ satām // RBhrs_4,3.57 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6538: dhyātvendrādy-āśrayatvena yad eṣv āhutir arpyate // RBhrs_4,3.59 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6539: ayaṃ tu sākṣāt tasyaiva nideśāt kurute makhān /
GR14ruphbr_u:6542: dharma-vīraṃ na manyante katicid dhanikādayaḥ* // RBhrs_4,3.61 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6549: ātmocitair vibhāvādyair nītā puṣṭiṃ satāṃ hṛdi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6550: bhavec choka-ratir bhakti-raso hi karuṇābhidhaḥ // RBhrs_4,4.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6552: aniṣṭāpteḥ padatayā vedyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'sya ca priyaḥ // RBhrs_4,4.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6554: ity asya viṣayatvena jñeyā ālambanās tridhā // RBhrs_4,4.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6555: tat-tad-vedī ca tad-bhakta āśrayatvena ca tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6564: uktā śoka-ratiḥ saiva sthāyī bhāva ihocyate // RBhrs_4,4.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6575: viṣam agatim avasthāṃ goṣṭha-rājasya rājñī // RBhrs_4,4.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6578: nīlāmbarasya vaktrendur nīlimānaṃ muhur dadhe // RBhrs_4,4.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6583: sa devarṣir muktān api tanu-bhṛtaḥ śocati bhṛśam // RBhrs_4,4.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6585: mātar mādri gatā kutas tvam adhunā hā kvāsi pāṇḍo pitaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6586: sāndrānanda-sudhābdhir eṣa yuvayor nābhūd dṛśāṃ gocaraḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6587: ity uccair nakulānujo vilapati prekṣya pramodākulo
GR14ruphbr_u:6589: ratiṃ vināpi ghaṭate hāsyāder udgamaḥ kvacit /
GR14ruphbr_u:6590: kadācid api śokasya nāsya sambhāvanā bhavet // RBhrs_4,4.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6591: rater bhūmnā kraśimnā ca śoko bhūyān kṛśaś ca saḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6592: ratyā sahāvinā-bhāvāt kāpy etasya viśiṣṭatā // RBhrs_4,4.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6596: ataḥ prādurbhavan śoko labdhāpy udbhaṭatāṃ muhuḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6597: durūhām eva tanute gatiṃ saukhyasya kām api // RBhrs_4,4.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6605: kṛṣṇo hito 'hitaś ceti krodhasya viṣayas tridhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6607: bhaktāḥ sarva-vidhā eva hite caivāhite tathā // RBhrs_4,5.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6609: sakhī-krodhe bhavet sakhyāḥ kṛṣṇād atyāhite sati // RBhrs_4,5.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6611: antaḥ-kleśa-kalaṅkitāḥ kila vayaṃ yāmo 'dya yāmyāṃ purīṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6614: hā medhāvini rādhike tava kathaṃ premā garīyān abhūt // RBhrs_4,5.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6616: krodho jaratyā vadhv-ādi-sambandhe prekṣite harau // RBhrs_4,5.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6618: are yuvati-taskara prakaṭam eva vadhvāḥ paṭas
GR14ruphbr_u:6619: tavorasi nirīkṣyate bata na neti kiṃ jalpasi /
GR14ruphbr_u:6620: aho vraja-nivāsinaḥ śṛṇuta kiṃ na vikrośanaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6623: sarveṣām eva govinde ratiḥ prauḍhā virājate // RBhrs_4,5.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6625: hitas tridhānavahitaḥ sāhasī cerṣyur ity api // RBhrs_4,5.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6628: kvacit tatra pramatto yaḥ prokto 'navahito 'tra saḥ // RBhrs_4,5.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6635: yaḥ prerako bhaya-sthāne sāhasī sa nigadyate // RBhrs_4,5.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6649: ahitaḥ syād dvidhā svasya hareś ceti prabhedataḥ // RBhrs_4,5.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6651: ahitaḥ svasya sa syād yaḥ kṛṣṇa-sambandha-bādhakaḥ // RBhrs_4,5.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6655: iti uttuṅgā mama madhu-pure yātrayā tatra tāsāṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6658: ahitas tu hares tasya vairi-pakṣo nigadyate // RBhrs_4,5.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6663: trir asya mukuṭopari sphuṭam udīrya savyaṃ padam // RBhrs_4,5.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6665: kṛṣṇāhita-hitasthāḥ syur amī uddīpanā iha // RBhrs_4,5.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6671: atra stambhādayaḥ sarve prākaṭyaṃ yānti sāttvikāḥ // RBhrs_4,5.23 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6674: atra krodha-ratiḥ sthāyī sa tu krodhas tridhā mataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6675: kopo manyus tathā roṣas tatra kopas tu śatru-gaḥ // RBhrs_4,5.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6677: roṣas tu dayite strīṇām ato vyabhicaraty asau // RBhrs_4,5.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6679: dṛg-anta-pāṭalatvādyā roṣe tu kathitāḥ kriyāḥ // RBhrs_4,5.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6682: mṛdhe magadha-bhūpatau kim api vaktram ākrośati /
GR14ruphbr_u:6685: {*Three syllables missing in the last line. Copyist error or typo?}
GR14ruphbr_u:6687: krośantyāṃ kara-pallavena balavān sadyaḥ pidhatte mukhaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6688: dhāvantyāṃ bhaya-bhāji vistṛta-bhujo rundhe puraḥ paddhatim /
GR14ruphbr_u:6689: pādānte viluṭhaty asau mayi muhur daṣṭādharāyāṃ ruṣā
GR14ruphbr_u:6690: mātaś caṇḍi mayā śikhaṇḍa-mukuṭād ātmābhirakṣyaḥ katham // RBhrs_4,5.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6693: tava girā jaṭile niṭile ca me /
GR14ruphbr_u:6700: kuṭena māṃ tad api vañcayate vadhūṭī // RBhrs_4,5.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6701: asmin na tādṛśo manyau vartate raty-anugrahaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6704: krodho rati-vinābhāvān na bhakti-rasatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,5.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6713: kṛṣṇaś ca dāruṇāś ceti tasminn ālambanā dvidhā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6714: anukampyeṣu sāgassu kṛṣṇas tasya ca bandhuṣu // RBhrs_4,6.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6716: darśanāc chravaṇāc ceti smaraṇāc ca prakīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6718: kiṃ śuṣyad-vadano 'pi muñca khacitaṃ citte pṛthuṃ vepathuṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6719: viśvasya prakṛtiṃ bhajasva na manāg apy asti mantuṃ tava /
GR14ruphbr_u:6720: uṣma-mrakṣitam ṛkṣa-rāja rabhasād vistīrya vīryaṃ tvayā
GR14ruphbr_u:6721: pṛthvī pratyuta yuddha-kautuka-mayī sevaiva me nirmitā // RBhrs_4,6.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6723: mura-mathana puras te ko bhujaṅgas tapasvī
GR14ruphbr_u:6724: laghu-haram iti kārṣīr mā sma dīnāya manyum /
GR14ruphbr_u:6726: aśaraṇam atimūḍhaṃ rakṣa rakṣa prasīda // RBhrs_4,6.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6741: vapur atipuruṣaṃ yā ghoram āviścakāra // RBhrs_4,6.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6745: krośanādyāḥ kriyāś cātra sāttvikāś cāśru-varjitāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6748: asmin bhagna-ratiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ syād aparādhataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6749: bhīṣaṇebhyaś ca tatra syād bahudhaivāparādhitā // RBhrs_4,6.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6750: taj-jā bhīr nāparatra syād anugrāhya-janān vinā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6751: ākṛtyā ye prakṛtyā ye ye prabhāveṇa bhīṣaṇāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6756: sadā bhagavato bhītiṃ gatā ātyantikīm api /
GR14ruphbr_u:6757: kaṃsādyā rati-śūnyatvād atra nālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,6.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6765: asau bhakti-raso dhīrair bībhatsākhya itīryate // RBhrs_4,7.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6766: asminn āśrita-śāntādyā dhīrair ālambanā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,7.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6770: citraṃ so 'yam udīrayan hari-guṇān udbāṣpa-dṛṣṭir jano
GR14ruphbr_u:6771: dṛṣṭe strī-vadane vikūṇita-mukho viṣṭabhya niṣṭhīvati // RBhrs_4,7.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6776: jugupsā-ratir atra syāt sthāyī sā ca vivekajā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6777: prāyikī ceti kathitā jugupsā dvi-vidhā budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,7.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6780: vivekotthā tu dehādau jugupsā syād vivekajā // RBhrs_4,7.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6785: bhagavati hanta rater lave 'py udīrṇe // RBhrs_4,7.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6788: yā prāyo jāyate seyaṃ jugupsā prāyikī matā // RBhrs_4,7.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6791: vasann eṣa klinno jaḍa-tanur ahaṃ mātur udare /
GR14ruphbr_u:6793: tad asmin kaṃsāre kuru mayi kṛpā-sāgara kṛpām // RBhrs_4,7.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6798: kṣiptās te smṛtim ākalayya naraka-dhvaṃsinn iha prāṇimaḥ // RBhrs_4,7.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6799: labdha-kṛṣṇa-rater eva suṣṭhu pūtaṃ manaḥ sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6800: kṣubhyaty ahṛdy aleśe 'pi tato 'syāṃ raty-anugrahaḥ // RBhrs_4,7.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6802: prācāṃ matānusāreṇa tad vijñeyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // RBhrs_4,7.13 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6803: amī pañcaiva śāntādyā harer bhakti-rasā matāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6804: eṣu hāsyādayaḥ prāyo bibhrati vyabhicāritām // RBhrs_4,7.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6812: mitratvaṃ śātravatvaṃ ca rasānām abhidhīyate // RBhrs_4,8.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6814: adbhutaś caiṣa prītādiṣu catuḥṣv api // RBhrs_4,8.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6815: dviṣann asya śucir yuddhavīro raudro bhayānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6817: vairī śucir yuddha-vīro raudraś caika-vibhāvakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6818: preyasas tu śucir hāsyo yuddha-vīraḥ suhṛd-varāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6819: dviṣo vatsala-bībhatsa-raudrā bhīṣmaś ca pūrvavat // RBhrs_4,8.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6821: śatruḥ śucir yuddha-vīraḥ prīto raudraś ca pūrvavat // RBhrs_4,8.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6822: śucer hāsyas tathā preyān suhṛd asya prakīrtitaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6824: prāhur eke 'sya suhṛdaṃ vīra-yugmaṃ pare ripum // RBhrs_4,8.7 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6825: mitraṃ hāsyasya bībhatsaḥ śuciḥ preyān savatsalaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6826: pratipakṣas tu karuṇas tathā prokto bhayānakaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.8 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6827: adbhutasya suhṛd vīraḥ pañca śāntādayas tathā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6828: pratipakṣo bhaved asya raudro bībhatsa eva ca // RBhrs_4,8.9 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6829: vīrasya tv adbhuto hāsyaḥ preyān prītis tathā suhṛt /
GR14ruphbr_u:6830: bhayānako vipakṣo 'sya kasyacic chānta eva ca // RBhrs_4,8.10 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6832: vairī hāsyo 'sya sambhoga-śṛṅgāraś cādbhutas tathā // RBhrs_4,8.11 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6833: raudrasya karuṇaḥ prokto vīraś cāpi suhṛd-varaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6834: pratipakṣas tu hāsye 'sya śṛṅgāro bhīṣaṇo 'pi ca // RBhrs_4,8.12 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6837: bībhatsasya bhavec chānto hāsyaḥ prītis tathā suhṛt /
GR14ruphbr_u:6838: śatruḥ śucis tathā preyān jñeyā yuktyā pare ca te // RBhrs_4,8.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6840: kathitebhyaḥ pare ye syus te taṭasthāḥ satāṃ matāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6841: suhṛdā miśraṇāṃ samyag āsvādaṃ kurute rasam // RBhrs_4,8.16 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6842: dvayos tu miśraṇe sāmyaṃ duḥśakaṃ syāt tulā-dhṛtam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6843: tasmād aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena melanaṃ viduṣāṃ matam // RBhrs_4,8.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6844: bhaven mukhyo 'tha vā gauṇo raso 'ṅgī kila yatra yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6845: kartavyaṃ tatra tasyāṅgaṃ suhṛd eva raso budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6847: aṅgatāṃ yatra suhṛdo mukhyā gauṇāś ca bibhrati // RBhrs_4,8.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6850: tasya padāmbuja-yugalaṃ kiṃ vā saṃvāhayiṣyāmi // RBhrs_4,8.20 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6863: atra mukhya eva mukhyasya gauṇayoś ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6872: yas tu dṛṣṭyā padminīnām api suṣṭhu hṛṇīyate // RBhrs_4,8.24 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6876: na tṛpyati na sarvataḥ sukha-maye samādhāv api /
GR14ruphbr_u:6877: na siddhiṣu ca lālasāṃ vahati labhyamānāsv api
GR14ruphbr_u:6878: prabho tava padārcane param upaiti tṛṣṇāṃ manaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.25 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6882: adharaṃ piñcha-cūḍasya calāś culūkayanti yāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.26 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6885: dṛśos taralitair alaṃ vraja nivṛtya mugdhe vrajaṃ
GR14ruphbr_u:6886: vitarkayasi māṃ yathā na hi tathāsmi kiṃ bhūriṇā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6898: vatsān avati vatso me hanta santapyate manaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.29 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6901: putras te navanīta-piṇḍam atanuṃ muṣṇan mamāntar-gṛhād
GR14ruphbr_u:6903: ity uktā kula-vṛddhayā suta-mukhe dṛṣṭiṃ vibhugna-bhruṇi
GR14ruphbr_u:6904: smerāṃ nikṣipatī sadā bhavatu vaḥ kṣemāya goṣṭheśvarī // RBhrs_4,8.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6912: kevale vatsale nāsti mukhyasya khalu sauhṛdam /
GR14ruphbr_u:6913: ato 'tra vatsale tasya natarāṃ likhitāṅgatā // RBhrs_4,8.32 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6918: sandeśam arpayati tanvi mad-artham eva // RBhrs_4,8.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6921: svasāsmi tava nirdaye paricinoṣi na tvaṃ kutaḥ
GR14ruphbr_u:6924: kṛtaṃ smitam abhijñayā guru-puras tadā rādhayā // RBhrs_4,8.34 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6928: smara-smerām ārād dṛśam asakalām arpayati ca /
GR14ruphbr_u:6929: bhujām aṃse sakhyuḥ pulakini dadhānaḥ phani-nibhām
GR14ruphbr_u:6934: tenaiṣām aṅgitā vyaktā mukhyānāṃ ca tathāṅgatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6935: tathāpy alpa-viśeṣāya kiñcid eva vilikhyate // RBhrs_4,8.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6944: māṃ yoddhuṃ milasi puraḥ kathaṃ viśāla /
GR14ruphbr_u:6946: śrīdāmā gaṇayati re tvam atra ko 'si // RBhrs_4,8.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6956: yaṣṭyā durbalayā vijitya purataḥ solluṇṭham udgāyataḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6958: kṛṣṇaḥ phulla-kapolakaḥ pulakavān visphāra-dṛṣṭir babhau // RBhrs_4,8.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6960: evam anyasya gauṇasya jñeyā kavibhir aṅgitā /
GR14ruphbr_u:6961: tathā ca mukhya-gauṇānāṃ rasānām aṅgatāpi ca // RBhrs_4,8.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6962: so 'ṅgī sarvātigo yaḥ syān mukhyo gauṇo 'thavā rasaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6963: sa evāṅgaṃ bhaved aṅgi-poṣī sañcāritāṃ vrajan // RBhrs_4,8.42 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6965: eka eva bhavet sthāyī raso mukhyatamo hi yaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6966: rasās tad-anuyāyitvād anye syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.43 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6968: rasānāṃ samavetānāṃ yasya rūpaṃ bhaved bahu /
GR14ruphbr_u:6969: sa mantavyo rasaḥ sthāyī śeṣāḥ saṅcāriṇo matāḥ // RBhrs_4,8.44 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6971: puṣṇan nija-prabhuṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇas tatraiva līyate // RBhrs_4,8.45 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6973: kuñcatā nija-nāthena gauṇo 'py aṅgitvam aśnute // RBhrs_4,8.46 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6974: mukhyas tv aṅgatvam āsādya puṣṇann indram upendravat /
GR14ruphbr_u:6977: bhāty eva na tu līnaḥ syād eṣa sañcāri-gauṇavat // RBhrs_4,8.48 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6978: aṅgī mukhyaḥ svam atrāṅgair bhāvais tair abhivardhayan /
GR14ruphbr_u:6979: sajātīyair vijātīyaiḥ svatantraḥ san virājate // RBhrs_4,8.49 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6980: yasya mukhyasya yo bhakto bhaven nitya-nijāśrayaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:6981: aṅgī sa eva tatra syān mukhyo 'py anyo 'ṅgatāṃ vrajet // RBhrs_4,8.50 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6984: tad vinā tasya sampāto vaiphalyāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_4,8.51 //
GR14ruphbr_u:6988: janayaty eva vairasyaṃ rasānāṃ vairiṇā yutiḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7002: śiraḥ kṛṣṇa tavāghrāya vihariṣye tatas tvayā // RBhrs_4,8.56 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7010: adyaiva dūti tena tvaṃ mayā ramaya mādhavam // RBhrs_4,8.58 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7012: ciraṃ jīveti saṃyujya kācid āśīrbhir acyutam /
GR14ruphbr_u:7016: kvacid bhavet tataḥ suṣṭhu vairasyāyaiva kalpate // RBhrs_4,8.60 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7024: smaryamāṇatayāpy uktau sāmyena vacane 'pi ca // RBhrs_4,8.63 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7027: ity ādiṣu na vairasyaṃ vairiṇo janayed yutiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.64 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7030: pratyāhṛtya muniḥ kṣaṇaṃ viṣayato yasmin mano dhitsate
GR14ruphbr_u:7031: bālāsau viṣayeṣu dhitsati tataḥ pratyāharantī manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7032: yasya sphūrti-lavāya hanta hṛdaye yogī sumutkaṇṭhate
GR14ruphbr_u:7033: mugdheyaṃ kila tasya paśya hṛdayān niṣkrāntim ākāṅkṣati // RBhrs_4,8.65 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7034: bādhyatvam atra śāntasya śucer utkarṣa-varṇanāt // RBhrs_4,8.66 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7042: sukhātmā bhavatī rādhe brahma-vidyeva rājate // RBhrs_4,8.68 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7044: rādhā śāntir ivonnidraṃ nirnimeṣekṣaṇaṃ ca mām /
GR14ruphbr_u:7045: kurvatī dhyāna-lagnaṃ ca vāsayaty adri-kandare // RBhrs_4,8.69 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7057: yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī // RBhrs_4,8.71 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7060: tatrāsmākaṃ yad-avadhi sakhe dṛṣṭir eṣā niviṣṭā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7061: satyaṃ brūmas tad-avadhi bhaved indum indīvaraṃ ca
GR14ruphbr_u:7071: saṅgatiḥ kila mukhyasya vairasyāyaiva jāyate // RBhrs_4,8.74 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7074: yāmi kāśya-gṛhaṃ yūnā manaḥ śyāmena me hṛtam // RBhrs_4,8.75 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7078: sadānandaṃ paraṃ brahma dṛṣṭyā seviṣyate mayā // RBhrs_4,8.76 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7084: aṅgayor aṅginaḥ puṣṭyai bhaved ekatra saṅgatiḥ // RBhrs_4,8.78 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7087: gariṣṭho 'yaṃ keśī girivad iti me vellati manaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7089: khalaṃ kṣundan kuryāṃ vrajam atitarāṃ śālinam aham // RBhrs_4,8.79 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7092: kamprā svedini cūrṇa-kuntala-taṭe ity ādi (BRS 4.8.31) // RBhrs_4,8.80 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7095: mitho vairāv api dvau yau bhāvau dharma-sutādiṣu /
GR14ruphbr_u:7096: kālādi-bhedat prākaṭyaṃ tau vindantau na duṣyataḥ // RBhrs_4,8.81 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7098: na syād ity ujjvale rādhā-kṛṣṇayor darśitaṃ purā // RBhrs_4,8.82 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7103: daityācāryās tad-āsye vikṛtim aruṇatāṃ malla-varyāḥ sakhāyo
GR14ruphbr_u:7104: gaṇḍaunnatyaṃ khaleśāḥ pralayam ṛṣigaṇā dhyāna-muṣṇāsram ambāḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7105: romāñcaṃ sāṃyugīnāḥ kam api nava-camatkāram antaḥ sureśā
GR14ruphbr_u:7106: lāsyaṃ dāsāḥ kaṭākṣaṃ yayur asita-dṛśaḥ prekṣya raṅge mukundam // RBhrs_4,8.84 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7108: svasmin dhūrye 'py amānī śiśuṣu gari-dhṛtāv udyateṣu smitāsyas
GR14ruphbr_u:7109: thūtkārī dadhni visre praṇayiṣu vivṛta-prauḍhir indre 'ruṇākṣaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7110: goṣṭhe sāśrur vidūne guruṣu hari-makhaṃ prāsya kampaḥ sa pāyād
GR14ruphbr_u:7111: āsāre sphāra-dṛṣṭir yuvatiṣu pulakī bibhrad adriṃ vibhur vaḥ // RBhrs_4,8.85 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7118: rasā eva rasābhāsā rasa-jñair anukīrtitāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.1 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7119: syus tridhoparasāś cānu-rasāś cāparasāś ca te /
GR14ruphbr_u:7120: uttamā madhyamāḥ proktāḥ kaniṣṭhāś cety amī kramāt // RBhrs_4,9.2 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7123: śāntādayo rasā eva dvādaśoparasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.3 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7126: tathā bībhatsa-bhūmādeḥ śānto hy uparaso bhavet // RBhrs_4,9.4 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7129: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭe tad evādya purāṇa-puruṣe tvayi // RBhrs_4,9.5 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7134: tvāṃ vinā kim api nāparam asti // RBhrs_4,9.6 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7162: dvayor ekatarasyaiva ratir yā khalu dṛśyate /
GR14ruphbr_u:7163: yān ekatra tathaikasya sthāyinaḥ sā virūpatā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7170: ahnāya kāpi gaitri aṅkuritām ayāsīt // RBhrs_4,9.14 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7172: etasyāḥ prāg-abhāve tu śucir noparaso bhavet // RBhrs_4,9.15 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7179: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu vadanty uparasaṃ śucim // RBhrs_4,9.17 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7182: latā-paśu-pulindīṣu vṛddhāsv api sa vartate // RBhrs_4,9.18 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7187: ratim iha pallavitāṃ hṛdi vyanakti // RBhrs_4,9.19 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7195: harer dṛk-cāpalaṃ vīkṣya sahajaṃ yā vighūrṇate // RBhrs_4,9.21 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7214: kailāsa-vāsinīṃ dāsīṃ kṛpā-dṛṣṭyā bhajasva mām // RBhrs_4,9.27 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7217: kaṭī-kaṇḍūtir ity ādyaṃ grāmyatvaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // RBhrs_4,9.28 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7219: kiṃ naḥ phaṇi-kiśorīṇāṃ tvaṃ puṣkara-sadāṃ sadā /
GR14ruphbr_u:7222: prakaṭa-prārthanādiḥ syāt sambhogādes tu dhṛṣṭatā // RBhrs_4,9.30 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7225: tvaṃ vidagdho 'si govinda kiṃ vā vācyam ataḥ param // RBhrs_4,9.31 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7226: evam eva tu gauṇānāṃ hāsādīnām api svayam /
GR14ruphbr_u:7230: rasā hāsyādayaḥ sapta śāntaś cānurasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.33 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7241: evam evātra vijñeyā vīrāder apy udāhṛtiḥ // RBhrs_4,9.36 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7242: aṣṭāv amī taṭastheṣu prākaṭyaṃ yadi bibhrati /
GR14ruphbr_u:7246: hāsādīnāṃ tadā te 'tra prājñair aparasā matāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.38 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7249: kṛṣṇam ārāj jarāsandhaḥ solluṇṭham ahasīn muhuḥ // RBhrs_4,9.39 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7251: uttamās tu rasābhāsāḥ kaiścid rasatayoditāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.40 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7253: bhāvāḥ sarve tad-ābhāsā rasābhāsāś ca kecana /
GR14ruphbr_u:7254: amī prokta-rasābhijñaiḥ sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ // RBhrs_4,9.41 //
GR14ruphbr_u:7263: iti śrī-śrī-bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau gauṇa-bhakti-rasa-nirūpaṇo nāma caturtho vibhāgaḥ samāptaḥ /
GR14ruphbr_u:7267: Thank you for using a Gaudiya Grantha Mandir text. Remember,
GR14ruphbr_u:7268: GGM is an open source network.
GR14ruphbr_u:7269: So, give back to the world community of scholars by notifying us of any mistakes or variant readings,
GR14ruphbr_u:7270: either by emailing us directly or by posting in the GGM forums. And if you are working closely on this or any other text,
GR14ruphbr_u:7271: please send us your edited version.
GR14ruphbr_u:7273: please help by donating to the cause.
GR14ruphbr_u:7274: The work done here will last for generations.
